Jessica has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, Jessica would like to send her child to school in order to earn a degree.

loans.use: to purchase additional marble, paint, brushes etc. for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Cristine

texts.en:
Cristine works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Cristine requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.  She has been in this business for 1 year now.

In the future, Cristine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
A married parent of two children, Elsa works hard to support her family. She has a bakery business in the Philippines and earns additional income from a general store. 

Elsa is borrowing 29,500 Philippine pesos through the Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to purchase additional ingredients for her bakery. She has sustained her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her bakery business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her rice farm

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia tiene 27 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos de 4 y 2 años de edad, respectivamente, su esposo es empleado en una empresa, donde se desempeña como vendedor y labora desde el año 2007.

Ella se dedica a lavar y planchar ropa de familias que viven dentro de la comunidad; por lo que les cobra $3.00 cada docena de piezas de vestir. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace más de 5 años; pues, ella anteriormente trabajó como empleada domestica.

El préstamo será invertido en la compra de un closet, mueble que le hace falta en su hogar para mantener ordenadas sus prendas de vestir y una mesa de comedor que le sirva para atender a su familia y personas que le visiten.

Cabe mencionar que hace dos años vivían con los suegros y que con fuertes sacrificios han construido su vivienda con bloque y que aun no está terminada y que es importante para ellos el tener estos muebles del hogar para mantener limpias y ordenada su casa.

Lo que desea realizar más adelante, es Solicitar financiamiento para construir el piso de su casa con cemento, actualmente, es de tierra y quiere emprender en el negocio de venta de ropa cuando su ultimo hijo cumpla los 6 años de edad.
texts.en:
Antonia, 27, lives with her husband and their 2 children, aged 4 and 2.  Her husband has been working as a salesman for a company since 2007.  

Antonia has a business washing and ironing clothes for families in her community.  She charges them $3.00 for a dozen pieces of clothing.  She has been doing this kind of work for more than 5 years.  Previously, she worked as a domestic.

Antonia will invest this loan in a closet, which is something she doesn't have in her home, so that she can keep her garments neat.   She will also buy a dining table that her family and visitors to the home can use.

It's worth mentioning that 2 years ago the family was living with her in-laws, but because of big sacrifices they have managed to build their home out of cement blocks.  Even though the house is not yet finished, it is important for them to have some furniture in the house to keep things neat and tidy.

In the future, Antonia wants to get a loan to put in a cement floor, because they currently have a dirt floor.  She also wants to start up a business selling clothing once her youngest daughter turns 6.

loans.use: to buy a closet

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of five children from Bohol, Philippines. She has been engaged in a fishing business together with her husband for more than 10 years now. This is the source of their income.

Nida is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets and fuel for the boat. With this loan, her husband will be able to improve his catch, giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and fuel for the boat

loans.name: Leslie

texts.en:
Leslie is 34 years old and married with three children.

Leslie works hard to provide for her family. She runs a buy and sell of rice grains business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

Leslie has borrowed and repaid five loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell of rice grains business for three years and earns additional income from her general store.

Leslie aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 40 years old and has three children. Jessica is married and all three children are in school.

Jessica is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Jessica requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jessica has been raising pigs for 15 years and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Jessica would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Anabelle works hard to support her family.

She has a food production business in the Philippines and earns additional income from raising pigs. Anabelle is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food business.

Anabelle has been sustaining her business activities through her past 18 loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her businesss.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store.  Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 21,000 through NWTF to buy bamboo, binder, and other fishing equipment.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past ten loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy bamboo, binder, and other fishing equipment.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is 49 years old and married with seven children. With five children currently in school, Melba works very hard to provide for them.

Melba runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for six years. She sells a variety of items such as shampoo, canned goods, candies, groceries, etc. 

Melba requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, candies, groceries, etc. in her general store.

In the future, Melba would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, candies,  groceries, etc. in her general store.

loans.name: Jona

texts.en:
Jona works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for twenty years.

Jona requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to customers.

In the future, Jona would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to customers.

loans.name: Chuchi

texts.en:
Chuchi is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a footwear retail business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more items like slippers, shoes and other footwear.

Chuchi has been in this business for 30 years. Chuchi earns more income from her general store.

Chuchi has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more items like slippers, shoes and other footwear.

loans.name: May Ann

texts.en:
May Ann is 28 years old and single. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

May Ann has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items like snack foods, sardines, noodles and other groceries.

May Ann has been in this business for nine years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items like snack foods, sardines, noodles and other groceries.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Gerardo, de 51 años, es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de su esposa Julia, con quien tiene 6 hijos, a los que sacan adelante en la casa que compraron hace 20 años. Su esposa desde las primeras horas del día, se dirige a sus sembríos pues ya no trabajan juntos, ambos se ayudaban constantemente. Cuenta que hace poco, comenzó a trabajar en una empresa constructora de carreteras, donde recibe un sueldo mensual que ayuda en los gastos del hogar. Por eso su esposa tomó las riendas de la agricultura. Cuida mucho de sus sembríos de maíz, papa y demás hortalizas. Además de las vacas que posee cuenta con 6, las que siempre le otorgar muchos litros de leche que comercializa a los productores de queso que la visitan todas las tardes. Ahora, Gerardo, espera poder aumentar su ganado, ya que recibe ganancias diarias de sus animales, “la agricultura, es por temporadas”, afirma, asimismo comenta que en sus tiempos libres y los fines de semana, apoya en los trabajos de campo. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “La rosa de paltarumi” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Gerardo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para esparcir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en: Gerardo is a 51-year-old hardworking man. He lives with his wife Julia, with whom he has six children, in a house they bought 20 years ago. His wife goes to their crops very early in the day, and although they no longer work together, they help each other constantly. Gerardo says that a little while ago he started working for a road construction company where he receives a monthly salary that helps with household expenses. For this reason, his wife took over the reins of the farming business, caring for their crops of corn, potatoes and other vegetables. They also have six cows that produce many liters of milk that they sell to cheese makers who come every afternoon. Now, Gerardo hopes to be able to increase his livestock because of the daily profits the animals produce. "Farming is seasonal," says Gerardo, who helps out in the fields during his free time and on weekends. He belongs to the "La Rosa De Paltarumi" community bank and this is his first loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he is very satisfied with the ability to further develop his activities with the support of all of you. He promises to make his payments on time, since he has always been a hardworking and honest person. Gerardo plans to invest the loan to purchase organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
La Señora Martha trabaja para una institución pública desde hace más de 20 años como responsable de datos estadísticos en control de pacientes.

Este crédito lo tiene destinado para el pago de matrícula de la universidad de la hija y la compra de una computadora. sueña en ver preparada a su hija profesionalmente esa es la herencia que le dejara.
texts.en:
Martha has worked at a public institution for more than 20 years, responsible for statistical data on patient control.

This loan will be used to pay her daughter's university costs and to buy a computer. Her dream is to see her daughter prepared to be a professional - this is the legacy that she will leave her.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's university costs.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is 47 years old, married, and has been blessed with five children. She runs a mobile phone money transfer business (M-pesa). She has been in business for the past three years. She also practices dairy farming. She is a hard-working and determined business lady. Faulu Kenya has helped her save for future purposes. 

Rosemary hopes to be a very successful lady. She requests a loan of 105,300 KES to add working capital for her money transfer business.

loans.use: to add working capital for her money transfer business

loans.name: Charming Joy

texts.en:
Charming Joy is 33 years old and married with one child. With her child currently in school, Charming Joy works very hard to provide for them.

Charming Joy runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 19,500 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell in her general store like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, oil,  groceries, etc. 

Charming Joy has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items. In the future she would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell like shampoo, noodles, canned goods, oil,  groceries, etc.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela, de 51 años, es una mujer sencilla y trabajadora vive en compañía de su hija Milagros a la que cuida en la casa que alquiló hace 3 años. Antes de tener la estabilidad económica que hoy posee, se encontró muchos obstáculos en el camino; según cuenta esto le sirvió para poder entregarse a Dios y seguir sus pasos ella es devota y lee mucho la biblia, es así que una de las integrantes de su asociación la invitó a participar en el grupo y así solicitar un préstamo para continuar con las ventas de sus productos nutricionales de catálogo, tiene 16 años trabajando en este rubro como una de las mejores vendedores de esta zona, comenta que ella misma consumió estos productos alimenticios y sano de sus malestares y ahora lleva una mejor calidad de vida, “yo misma soy el reflejo de la efectividad de mis productos”, afirma. Pero como es una mujer trabajadora, también se dedica a la agricultura, siendo esta una segunda actividad económica. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “La rosa de paltarumi” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Estela, invertirá el dinero en la compra de productos alimenticios naturales para su venta.
texts.en: Estela is a 51-year-old hardworking and modest woman who lives with her daughter Milagros in a home she has rented for three years. Before having the economic stability she has today, Estela had many obstacles in her path, and she says this led her to turn to God and follow His lead. She is devout and reads the Bible a lot. That is how one of the members of the community bank invited her to join the group and request a loan to help her selling natural products via catalog. Estela has been working in this trade for 16 years as one of the top sellers in her area. She says she herself uses the nutrition and health products and now has a better quality of life. "I myself am a reflection of the effectiveness of my products," she says. As a hardworking woman, she also works in farming as a secondary source of income. She belongs to the "La Rosa De Paltarumi" community bank and this is her first loan with Kiva partner MFP. She feels very satisfied to be able to further develop her activities with the support of all of you, and she promises to make her payments on time since she has always been a hardworking and honest woman. Estela plans to use the loan to purchase natural health products to sell.

loans.use: to purchase natural health products to sell.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en:
Mark is 24 years old, married, and runs a tailoring shop. He is a very hard-working man and is also God-fearing. He describes his business as very competitive and his customers as very loyal. Since he became a client of Faulu Kenya, he has learnt how to save his money. 

He wishes to open a boutique and be the main supplier of uniforms in his area. He requires a loan of 42,727 KES to buy fabric.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an Avon dealership business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to purchase more personal products to sell.

Mary Grace has been in this business for twelve years. She earns more income from her general store.

Mary Grace has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough money to further build and expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more personal products to sell.

loans.name: Davron

texts.ru: Даврону 55 лет. Он женат и имеет четверо детей. Даврон трудолюбивый человек. Он зарабатывает на жизнь куплей и продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Он занимается животноводческой деятельностью уже два года и делает это с интересом. Сейчас Даврон хотел бы расширить свой бизнес - увеличить поголовье скота и получить хорошую прибыль. Для осуществления своей цели он запрашивает кредит на сумму 1500 долларов для закупа скота.
texts.en: Davron is 55 years old.  He is married and has four children.  Davron is a hardworking man.  He earns money to live on by buying and selling large-horned livestock.  He has been raising livestock for two years now and does it with interest.  Now Davron would like to expand his business - increase his livestock count and earn a good profit.  In order to achieve his goal he is asking for a loan of 1500 dollars for the purchase of livestock.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Alcides Isaac

texts.es: Alcides, 59 años de edad,  es sencillo comerciante habitante de la ciudad de Estelí, casado, padre de 4 hijos todos mayores de edad, el solo logro finalizar el segundo grado de primaria. Desde muy joven ha trabajado para sustentar a la familia de igual manera lo continuo haciendo cuando se caso. Él se dedica a vender ropa, artículos para el hogar, sus ventas las realiza de manera ambulante sale a vender a las comunidades en las afueras de Estelí, vende su mercadería de contado y de crédito  su hijo mayor le ayuda a vender  su  esposa es  ama de casa. Su expectativa es salir adelante y seguir vendiendo más para llegar  ser un reconocido empresario en el sector comercio. Él requiere el crédito para comprar mercadería tales como ropa, zapatos, pantalones, blusas, faldas, vestidos, bóxer, calzones. Dentro de sus planes futuros esta poner una tienda en la ciudad comprar vitrinas y maniquíes, agregarles nuevos productos de uso doméstico, este proyecto lo piensa hacer junto con su esposa para que ella atienda la venta mientras el sigue vendiendo en las comunidades.
texts.en: Alcides is a 59-year-old modest merchant living in the city of Esteli, Nicaragua. He is married and has four children, all grown up. He was only able to complete the second grade and from a very young age had to work to feed his family, which he continued doing after he married. Alcides makes a living selling clothing and household items. He sells his products by going to different communities on the outskirts of Esteli and makes the transactions on cash and credit, and his oldest son helps him with the selling. His spouse is a housewife. His expectations are to keep making headway and selling more products in order to become a recognized businessman. Alcides is requesting the loan to purchase products such as clothes, shoes, pants, blouses, skirts, dresses, boxer shorts and socks. Among his plans for the future is to have a shop in the city by buying display cases and mannequins and new household products. He plans to do this project with his wife so she can tend to the store while he still goes out to sell in the communities.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as clothes, shoes, pants, blouses, skirts, dresses, boxer shorts and socks.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel  is fifty-two and a farmer in Kitale county in Kenya where he lives with his wife and six  children. Three of them are still schooling. He has been in farming for the past twenty-five years, producing milk, maize and poultry products which he sells at the local market in his area. He runs a retail shop as an additional source of income.

He is requesting a 60,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to purchase poultry birds which he will raise and sell and earn extra income to help him uplift his livelihood and also pay for his children’s schooling. He aspires to have bought another dairy  cow and more poultry birds in the next five years.

Poor transport networks and high competition are his major challenges in farming.

Samuel is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for financing him with the loan.

loans.use: To purchase poultry birds

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 55 years old, married and has three children. She is raising hogs to re-sell for a profit. She usually earns P2,000 for each hog raised. She is still sending her youngest child to school and that is why she keeps on maintaining good sales from her business. She is now asking for a loan of P6,000 to buy feed, vaccines and medicines for her hogs' sustainability. It will help her hogs grow healthier and be profitable.

She hopes to become a succesful hog grower and keep earning good profit for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and medicines for her hogs' sustainability

loans.name: Doris Del Socorro

texts.es:
La Señora Doris del socorro trabaja para una escuela pública desde hace más de 20 años como maestra de primaria

solicita a ceprodel un  crédito para el pagos de gastos médicos, exámenes y recuperación de su persona donde va ser sometida a una operación. 

desea mejorar su salud para continuar con sus labores y poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
Doris has been teaching in a public school for over 20 years as a primary instructor. 

She is requesting this loan from CEPRODEL to pay for medical expenses, exams, and her recovery in the place where she will undergo an operation. 

She hopes to improve her health in order to continue working and being able to help her family.

loans.use: to pay for medical and recovery expenses.

loans.name: Yesenia Maricela

texts.es: Yesenia Maricela vive junto a su compañero de vida Henri, ella esta como empleada en una tienda por mayor donde venden toda clase de productos de primera necesidad es un trabajo estable y tiene varios años laborando lo que le ha dado experiencia en las ventas convirtiéndose asi en una de las mejores, obteniendo las mejores ganancias, su trabajo esta ubicado en un lugar accesible y muy cercano a su vivienda; Yesenia es una mujer entregada a su labor, dispuesta a dar todo de su parte para cumplir sus metas lo mas impórtate en su vida es su familia y en las ultimas semanas el deterioro de su vivienda ha incomodado la tranquilidad de su hogar, la casa necesita reparaciones y quiere realizarlas lo mas pronto posible para la seguridad de todos,  es una mujer comprometida y no duda que podrá realizar los cambios lo mas pronto posible obteniendo el éxito deseado, necesita invertir pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillos, piso, herramientas etc. Yesenia Maricela tiene buenas referencias de pago y se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda, esta agradecida con la ayuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Yesenia Maricela lives with her life companion, Henri. She is employed in a wholesale store that sells all kinds of basic necessities. It is a stable job where she has gained several years of sales experience and become one of their best salespeople, earning the best profits. Her job is located in a place that is accessible and very close to her home. 

Yesenia is a women devoted to her work, ready to do all she can in order to meet her goals. Her family is the most important factor in her life and in recent weeks the deterioration of her house has disturbed the serenity of her home. Her house needs repairs and she wants to make them as soon as possible for everyone’s security. She is a woman who meets her commitments and does not doubt that she will be able to make the desired changes as soon possible. She needs to invest in her house but does not have sufficient capital.  Thus she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy cement, bricks, flooring, tools, etc.

Yesenia Maricela has good credit references and she will take responsibility for paying off the debt. She is grateful for the help and also hopes that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, flooring and tools.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo  tiene 46 años de edad, es divorciado, el vive solo . El crédito lo quiere para la compra de vacas doble prosito, para cría y leche. El quiere aumentar un poco la cantidad de animales, para tener más posibilidad de vender más leche. El se ha dedicado con su familia al cultivo de granos básicos complementado con la ganadería. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Ricardo is 46 years old, divorced and lives alone. He is requesting the loan to purchase dual-purpose cows to raise and milk. He wants to increase his animal count by a little so he has more possibilities to sell more milk. He has made a living cultivating basic grains, complemented by the livestock. This is his first loan with Kiva partner FUDECOSUR and he has not had other loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR provides him with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Joaquin Alberto

texts.es: Joaquín Alberto es un microempresario de 50 años, casado y padre de dos hijos de 25 y 23 años, uno de ellos está cursando la universidad. Se dedica a realizar trabajos de joyería, elabora piezas con oro y plata y también hace reparaciones. Tiene treinta años de haber instalado su negocio, aprendió el oficio desde muy joven por la necesidad de tener una fuente de ingreso y ayudar a solventar los gastos de su hogar, luego de un tiempo pudo instalar su propio establecimiento. Actualmente cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo mayor y su esposa quien trabaja en el extranjero. Esta vez solicita el crédito con el objetivo de invertir en capital de trabajo como oro y plata. Su meta es ampliar su negocio. Joaquin está muy agradecido con  la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno
texts.en: Joaquín Alberto is a 50-year-old small-businessman. He is married and has two children, ages 25 and 23, one of whom attends a university. Joaquín makes a living as a jeweler, making items with gold and silver and also doing repairs. He set up his business 30 years ago after learning the trade when he was very young to help his family with household expenses. He currently has the support of his eldest son and his wife, who is working abroad. This time, he is requesting the loan to invest in raw materials like gold and silver. His goal is to expand his business. Joaquín is very grateful for the help Kiva lenders provide to people with few resources in poor countries like Nicaragua so they can have a means to a decent living.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials, such as gold, silver and pearls, for his jewelry business.

loans.name: Ronaliza

texts.en:
Ronaliza works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store in the Philippines.

Ronaliza requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

She has been in this business for six years.

In the future, Ronaliza would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Julia Dalila

texts.es: Julia, 58 años de edad , de oficio agricultora, se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y tabaco. Su primer préstamo Kiva fue de mucha  ayuda pues llego cuando mas lo necesitaba le permitió invertir en sus siembras , mejorar poco a poco su humilde vivienda y la impulso a diversificar mas su negocio. Esta necesitando financiamiento para comprar 2 vacas paridas , pues desea vender leche y productos derivados tales como crema, queso y mantequilla . Desea fortalecer al igual que la siembra la crianza de ganado y luchar cada día por lograr alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julia is 58 years old and makes a living in agriculture, farming corn, beans and tobacco. Her first Kiva loan was very helpful because it came when she most needed to invest in her crops, and she made improvements to her humble home little by little and diversified her business as a result. She is requesting this loan to purchase two milk cows because she wants to sell milk and other dairy products like cream, cheese and butter. She also wants to strengthen her farming business as much as the livestock and fight every day for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase two milk cows.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es: Miguel  tiene 59 años de edad, es casado, el vive con la esposa y dos hijos. El crédito lo quiere es comprar madera y además barniz, clavos, y otros utensilios necesarios para hacer muebles. El quiere aumentar un poco la cantidad de materia prima para hacer mayor cantidad de muebles y poder venderlos en el mercado local y lugares aledaños  y poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Miguel is 59 years old, married and lives with his wife and two children. He is requesting the loan to purchase wood, varnish, nails and other materials needed to make furniture. He wants to increase his raw materials in order to have more furniture to sell at the local market and those in the surrounding area. This will give him more financial stability so he can provide his family with a better quality of life. This is his first loan with Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR provides him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase wood and materials to make furniture.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Luz, de 32 años es una mujer responsable, vive en compañía de su pequeña hija, en su casa propia que heredó hace poco. 
Proviene de una familia que se dedica a bordados artesanales y siempre estuvo ligada a este trabajo, es así que su entrenamiento lo hizo desde su niñez y ahora que es una persona adulta esta  preparada para  afrontar la vida y es por ello que continuara en el arte de los bordados de fustanes como traje típico para las festividades locales como Santiago y siempre se prepara para ello. Ella vende ofreciendo los bordados a los elencos de danza típica de las diversas escuelas y colegios de su zona, su deseo es ampliar sus posibilidades de ventas a fin de que con las ganancias pueda solventar la educación de su pequeña hija de 6 años. Ahora desea seguir trabajando con mucho esmero, pues desea abrir una tienda de alquiler de disfraces. Este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias.
Luz, invertirá el dinero en la compra de telas e hilos para sus bordados, ya que comprando en cantidad sale mucho más barato y hay mayor ganancia.
texts.en:
Luz, 32, is a responsible woman who lives with her young daughter in a house that she recently inherited.  She comes from a family of artisans who work with embroidery, and so she has always had ties to this type of work.  She was trained in this art from the time she was a child, and now she is an adult who is prepared to face life.  This is why she will continue with her embroidery art, decorating petticoats such as the ones typically worn in the local festivities, such as the Santiago dance festival.  She is always preparing these garments, offering her embroidered products to the traditional dance troupes in the various schools in her area.  Her desire is to expand her sales opportunities, so that with her earnings she can pay for the education of her small daughter, who is 6 years old.  

At this time, Luz wants to continue to work with great care, because she wants to open a costume rental shop.  This is her 17th loan with MFP, where she awaits your cooperation so that she can continue toward her goals.  Also, she promises once more to comply with the payment terms of her loan.  Luz appreciates being part of her communal bank, because all of the members are responsible and supportive.  

Luz will invest this money in the purchase of fabrics and thread for her embroidery business, because if she buys in bulk she can get the supplies at a much lower cost and thus increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread for her embroidery business

loans.name: Feliz

texts.es: Feliz, 75 años de edad, originario de la comunidad El Coyolar, Yali en las afueras de Estelí, de oficio agricultor, se dedica a sembrar café, casado, padre de 5 hijos, todos mayores de edad. Desde muy temprana edad se ha dedicado a trabajar en el campo, debido a su situación de pobreza en la que nació no pudo seguir estudiando, solo aprendió lo básico a poner sus iniciales como firma. El se dedicó a sembrar específicamente el rubro del café debido a que la zona en donde vive los terrenos son aptos y fértiles para sembrar café orgánico. Sus humildes manos comienzan sus labores desde tempranas horas de la madrugada y regresa por las tardes luego de un extenso día en el campo un machete y botas de hule son parte de su uniforme diario con el que sale a sembrar una mejor calidad de vida para su familia, parte de sus actividades del campo las realiza junto con sus hijos quienes lo apoyan en los procesos de siembra y venta del producto. El está solicitando el financiamiento para pagar mano de obra , comprar abono, fertilizantes para darle un mejor mantenimiento a 2 manzanas de café. El espera obtener una buena cosecha y lograr venderlo a un buen precio que le permita cubrir lo costos de producción y al mismo tiempo le permita ampliar más sus siembras de café.
texts.en:
Feliz, 75, is a native of the community El Coyolar, Yali, located on the outskirts of Estelí. As a farmer, he grows coffee beans. He is married and a father of five children who are all adults. Since a very young age, he has worked in the field. Because he was born into a situation of poverty, he could not continue studying; he only learned the basics of putting down his initials as a signature. He devotes himself specifically to the coffee industry since the area in which he lives is appropriate and fertile for growing organic coffee beans. 

His humble hands begin their labor from the early hours of the morning and he returns during the evenings after a long day in the field. A machete and rubber boots are part of his daily uniform for when he goes out to sow a better life for his family. He does some of his field activities together with his children who help him with the sowing and selling of the product. 

He is requesting this loan to pay for labor and to buy manure and fertilizers to provide better land maintenance for about 3.5 acres of coffee trees. He hopes to have a good harvest and to manage selling it at a good price that will allow him to cover production costs, and at the same time, to increase his cultivated land.

loans.use: to pay for labor and to buy manure and fertilizers.

loans.name: Adriana María

texts.es:
Adriana es una mujer de 47 años de edad, a la que la vida le ha enseñado que para salir adelante se requiere de esfuerzo y disciplina. Al fallecer su esposo, tuvo que hacerse cargo de los gastos del hogar y de la educación de su hijo, Por lo cual inició en la sala de su vivienda realizando cortes y cepillados a las personas del sector. Esta actividad la aprendió gracias a un familiar. 
Por su amabilidad y excelente prestación del servicio esta mujer se ganó el respeto y el aprecio de sus clientes lo que le permitió expandir su negocio y alquilar un local. Hoy siente que gran parte de sus sueños se han cumplido porque gracias a su oficio le ha brindado a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. 
En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de productos de belleza y realizar adecuaciones locativas a su negocio con el propósito de seguir creciendo y convertir su salón de belleza en el mejor de su municipio.
texts.en: Adriana is 47 years old, and life has taught her that making headway requires hard work and discipline. After her husband died, she became in charge of household expenses and her son's education, so she started a beauty salon out of her home. She learned this activity thanks to a relative. Thanks to her friendliness and her excellent service, she gained the respect and appreciation of her customers, which allowed her to expand her business and rent a site for her salon. Today, she feels like a big part of her dreams have come true because thanks to her work she has been able to provide her son with a better quality of life. She is requesting the loan to purchase beauty products and modify her salon with the goal to keep growing and make her salon the best in town.

loans.use: to purchase beauty supplies and modify her salon.

loans.name: Florentina

texts.es: Florentina, de 36 años es una mujer alegre. Vive en compañía de su esposo Alex y sus 3 hijos: Noemí, Marlon y Lismar, a los que cuida en la casa que compraron hace 16 años. Durante más de 10 años su esposo se dedica a la construcción, como albañil tiene muchos pedidos de diversos lugares de la localidad, es por esa razón que ella siempre le ayuda. Aprovecha los trabajos que tiene su esposo para poder realizar amistades y ofrecer ropa variada y surtida, pues desde hace 6 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tamaña y calidad. Comenta que le va muy bien en su negocio, además gusta mucho de compartir su trabajo con su esposo, “ambos somos muy unidos, trabajamos juntos e invertimos el dinero en mejorar nuestros negocio”, afirma. Este es el crédito número 5 con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Florentina, invertirá el dinero en la compra de prendas de vestir que tiene como pedido.
texts.en:
Florentina, 36, is a cheerful woman. She lives in the company of her husband Alex and their three children: Noemí, Marlon, and Lismar, whom she takes of in the home that they bought 16 years ago. For more than 10 years, her husband has worked in construction. As a mason, he has many requests from various places in the locality; it's for this reason that she always helps him. 

She makes good use of the work her husband has by making friends and offering varied and assorted clothing. For six years, she has been selling clothing of all sizes and quality. She says that her business is going very well. She also affirms that she likes working with her husband very much: "both of us are very united, we work together and we invest our money in improving our businesses."

This is her fifth loan with MFP where she hopes for their collaboration to continue with her goals. On the other hand, she promises once more to comply with her installment payments. Also, she is pleased to be a part of her communal bank because all of its members are responsible and very caring people. Florentina will use this loan to buy garments that her customers have ordered from her.

loans.use: to buy garments that her customers have ordered from her.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 30 years old, married and has two children. She used her previous loan to buy seedlings for beans and animal feed. Her business did very well and she repaid her loan. She rears pigs and has been in business for the past twelve years. She also earns an income from the dairy cows she rears. She is very hard working. Faulu Kenya has helped her save her money for future purposes.

She hopes to increase her pigs and her dairy cows. She wants a loan of 10,428 KES to buy a microwave for home use.

loans.use: to buy a microwave.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is 42 years old and married with eight children.

Ma. Teresa works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, snack foods, canned goods, sugar, groceries etc., in her general store.

Ma. Teresa has borrowed and repaid three loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from ready-to-wear products.

Ma. Teresa aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan is thirty-nine years old and a farmer in the Kitale county in Kenya. She lives with her husband and two children; who are both school. She has been in farming for the past eight years producing milk and poultry products which she sells at the local market in her area. She runs a posho mill as an additional source of income.

She is requesting 40,000 KES loan from juhudi kilimo to purchase poultry birds and materials for constructing a dairy unit which will help her take better care of her dairy cows and thus more milk production. From the sale of milk and poultry products, she will earn extra income to uplift the family’s livelihood and later use some of the money to pay for her children’s education. She aspires to have acquired another piece of land for more production in the next five years.

Inadequate capital and high cost of production are her major challenges in farming.

She is very grateful to juhudi kilimo for financing her with the loan.

loans.use: to purchase poultry birds and to buy materials for constructing a zero grazing unit.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marlene works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and earns additional income from her general store. Marlene is borrowing PHP 22,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Marlene has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en: Joy is a 65-year-old divorced woman with five children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She trades in foods as her only source of income and with the proceeds, she has been able to educate her children and buy land for farming. Price fluctuation and inflation affect the business. Her dream is to diversify and trade in a variety of foods. Joy intends to use the loan to buy millet to sell.

loans.use: to buy millet to sell.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 59-year-old farmer in Kitale county, where he lives with his wife. He has six children who are all adults and have finished schooling. He has been in farming for the past 30 years, producing milk, horticultural and poultry products, which he sells at the local market in his area.

He is requesting a 61,200 KES (Kenyan shillings) loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow and also buy materials for constructing a zero-grazing unit. This will help him to take good care of his dairy cows and also increase production of more milk and thus, make more income to help improve the family’s living standards. He aspires to have doubled his production in the next five years.

High cost of production and low market prices are his major challenges in farming.

He is grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for financing him with the loan.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow and buy materials for constructing a zero-grazing unit.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct rental houses

loans.name: Asanbek

texts.ru: Асанбек имеет высшее образование по специальности геолог. Ему 51 год, женат и воспитали 4 детей, трое взрослые и обустроены. В течении долгого времени Асанбек работает прорабомв родном селе. Имеет хорошие отзывы от односельчан, Асанбек, в поисках дополнительного источника дохода, начал заниматься разведением скота. Начав свой бизнес со стартовой суммой 10,000 сом , Асанбек приложил все усилия для развития своего бизнеса, приносящего на сегодняшний день прибыль в 7,000 сом ежемесячно от перепродажи скота. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асанбек обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 жеребят. В будущем, Асанбек планирует расширять поголовье скота, с целью повышения доходов от перепродажи скота.
texts.en: Asanbek has a post-secondary education in the field of geology. He is 51 years old, married, and has raised 4 children, 3 of whom are now grown up and established in their own lives. For a long time, he has worked as the supervisor of public works of his hometown. He is well-regarded by his fellow citizens. As a means of supplementing his income, he began raising cattle. He started this business with just 10,000 Kyrgyzstan Som and has worked hard to develop it to the point where it currently brings in a monthly income of 7,000 Som from the sale of cattle. For the further development of his business, Asanbek has approached Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 50,000 Som (KGS) to buy two colts. In the future, he plans to expand the number of cattle he has for the purpose of increasing his profit from the sale of cattle.

loans.use: To purchase two horses

loans.name: Batbold

texts.en: Mr. Batbold, 48 years old, lives with his daughter and mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. His daughter graduated last year and now teaches elementary classes at school. He has been rendering taxi service to local people for five consecutive years and accumulated a vast amount of experience. His mother gets a pension from the state. He is requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to import goods from Korea. Then he will exchange those import goods for cashmere, which will be sold to customers and facilities in Ulaanbaatar. As a result, he can generate more income for his family. The borrower used our loan two times before and paid each installment on a fixed schedule without delay. He is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future and wants to help his daughter with her wedding expenses.

loans.use: to purchase goods from Korea

loans.name: Juliana

texts.en:
Juliana is 35 years old, married and has been blessed with four children. She runs a beauty salon and has been in business for the past 12 years. She was previously employed in a salon where she got her experience. Her salon is very busy and she has five employees who work on commission. Faulu Kenya has helped her pay school fees for her children and she has managed to buy new salon equipment.

She wishes to open a hardware shop and expand her business. She requests a loan of 42,727 KES to buy hair chemicals, braids, hair oils and a blow dryer.

loans.use: to buy hair chemicals, braids, hair oils and a blow dryer

loans.name: Hurshed

texts.ru:
Хуршид успешно погасив свой предыдущий кредит, решил падать заявку на следующий кредит, так как с помощью предыдущего кредита он намного расширил свой бизнес. Он  занимается разведением скота.  Его жена с матерью ухаживают за скотом, каждое утро доят молоко и производят  различные молочные продукты: сметану, ряженку, творог и продают на рынке. В этом году Хуршид хочет построить еще один коровник, так как с каждым годом скот увеличивается и место в старом коровнике недостаточны для дальнейшего разведения скота.  Этот бизнес у него дает очень хороший доход.  
На полученный кредит Хуршид хочет купить строительные материалы и построить новый коровник.    Он очень рад, что может получить поддержку от КИВА и реализовать свои планы.
texts.en: Having successfully paid back his previous loan, Hurshed has decided to apply for a second loan, as the prior one allowed him to substantially expand his business of raising cattle. His wife and mother-in-law take care of the cows, and every morning they milk them and produce dairy products such as sour cream, ryazhenka (a type of yogurt drink), and cottage cheese, which they then sell at the market. This year Hurshed wants to build another cowshed for his cows because with each passing year, his herd gets larger and his current cowshed is not large enough to accommodate any future expansion. This business is bringing in a very good income for him. Hurshed wants to use this loan to buy building materials so he can build a new cowshed. He is very happy that he can receive the support of Kiva to realise his plans.

loans.use: to purchase of building materials

loans.name: Mirzoali

texts.ru: Мирзоали 29 лет. Он проживает вместе с родителями в городе Дангара. У него среднее образование. Мирзоали с 19 лет занимается животноводством. Он покупает коров и телят, откормливает их и затем продает с наценкой на рынке своего города. Также Мирзоали в свободное время работает таксистом. Мирзоали хочет расширить свой бизнес, и поэтому он берет кредит на сумму 1800 долларов для приобретения крупно-рогатого скота.
texts.en: Mirzoali is 29 years old and he lives with his parents in the town of Dangara. He has a high school education. Since he was 19 years old, he has been working in the field of animal husbandry. He buys cows and calves, fattens them, then sells them for a profit at the local market. In his free time, he also works as a taxi driver. Mirzoali now wants to expand his business, and for this reason, he is seeking a loan of 1,800 dollars to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Samiboy

texts.ru: Самеъбой – активный и трудолюбивый молодой человек. Имеет многолетний опыт по изготовлению национальных лепёшек.  Раньше работал в руках у одного пекаря в пекарни, но к его большому сожалению хозяин пекарни уехал в другой город, а пекарня закрылась, и он остался без работы.  Самеъбой, его жена и ребёнок живут с родителями в одной квартире и чтобы как то прокормить семью Самеъбой решил открыть свою пекарню.  На данный момент он арендует помещение и занимается изготовлением лепёшок.  Но в связи с болезни матери он не смог вложить нужную очередную сумму в свой маленький бизнес и на данный момент нуждается в небольшой сумме денег.  Чтобы решить свою проблему и заработать определённую сумму для дальнейшего проживания и содержание семьи  он решил обращаться за кредитом.  На приобретённый кредит планирует закупить муку и уголь. Самеъбой надеется, что этим сможет продвинуть свой бизнес и приобрести определённый доход. Он благодарит  организацию  «Кива» за содействие в его развитие бизнеса и спокойствие в семье.
texts.en: Samiboy is an active and hardworking young man. He has many years of experience producing traditional Tajik flat breads. He used to work in a bakery for another baker, but to his big regret the owner of the bakery moved to another town and the bakery closed down so he was left without work. Samiboy, his wife and child live with parents in one apartment and to be able to feed the family he decided to open his own bakery. At this time he rents out a space where he makes flat breads. Because of his mother's illness he could not invest the necessary amount into his small business and right now needs in a small amount of money. To solve this problem and make the needed amount for living and support of his family he has decided to come for a loan. He plans to use the loan to buy flour and coal. Samiboy hopes that he will be able to advance his business and get a certain profit. He is thanking Kiva for the support in the growth of his business and well being of his family.

loans.use: to purchase coal and flour.

loans.name: Tolibjon

texts.ru: Толибчону 33 года. Он со своей семьей живет в городе Дангара. Толибчон работает охранником в отделе охраны. Одновременно он занимается животноводством. Толибчон покупает крупно-рогатый скот, его жена откармливает их, и затем он сам продает скот на рынке с наценкой. Чтобы расширить свой бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль, Толибчон запрашивает кредит для закупа скота.
texts.en: Tolibjon is 33 years old and he lives with his family in the town of Dangara. He works as a guard in a security firm. He is also involved in animal husbandry. He purchases cattle, his wife fattens them, then he sells them for a profit at the local market. In order to expand his business and earn a good income, Tolibjon is now seeking a loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Erick

texts.es: Erick tiene la edad de 21 años, está casado y vive con la esposa y dos hijos. El crédito lo quiere para la compra almacigo de café para resembrar la plantación de café, que está un poco dañada y además quiere comprar insumos como  abono y fumigaciones. El desea darle el adecuado mantenimiento al cultivo y resembrar las partes dañadas para que este le permita tener una mayor producción y así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El  trabaja desde hace varios  años en café. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y  poder seguir creciendo como persona y como productor. . Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Erick is 21 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children. He would like this loan in order to buy coffee seedlings for replanting his coffee plantation, which is a bit damaged. He would also like to buy supplies like fertilizer and fumigants. He would like to perform adequate maintenance for his crops and to replant the damaged parts. This would allow him to improve his production and thereby increase his income. Erick has been working with coffee for several years. He hopes that in the future he will be able to offer his family a better quality of life and greater economic stability, and to continue growing as a person and as a producer. This is the first loan he has received through FUDECOSUR. He has not had loans from state banks either, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings and agricultural supplies

location.town: Bello Oriente, Agua Buena, Coto Brus

loans.name: Alexander

texts.ru:
Александр работает кузнецом. Он арендует помещение размером в 150 квадратных метров для своего кузнечного цеха на территории бывшей фабрики. Александр занимается этим бизнесом уже 9 лет. Изготавливает кованные ворота, перила, разные решётки для окон, делает также художественную ковку. 
Александр обратился к КИВА за кредитом в размере 22 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести оборудование для бизнеса и расширять свое дело. Александр разносторонне развитый человек: он не только замечательный мастер, но хороший семьянин и любитель активного отдыха. Он любит ездить в горы на велосипеде, устраивает веломаршруты на несколько дней, проводя таким образом время с семьей.
texts.en: Alexander works as a blacksmith. He rents premises of 150 square meters to use as his work space on the territory of a now-defunct factory. He has been working in this business for 9 years. He makes gates, railings, grilles for windows, and he also produces some artistic items. Alexander has approached Kiva for a loan of 22,000 Ukrainian Hryvnya to purchase some equipment for business so he can expand it. He is a man of diverse interests: he is not only a remarkable blacksmith, but a good family man who loves active holidays. He enjoys biking to the mountains and he maps out bike routes that are several days in duration for him and his family to ride together.

loans.use: to buy equipment for his business

loans.name: Shehnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shehnaz is a 41-year-old woman. She is a responsible mother of seven children. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Her husband died a few years ago. After his death, she has faced a very difficult time. Her elder son is a rickshaw driver. 

Shehnaz is an efficient and excellent tailor. For the past six years, she has been operating her tailoring business. She provides tailoring services in her community. She currently needs to purchase some products, like threads, needles, clothes etc for her tailoring business.

To do that she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan. She is hopeful that the loan will help increase production.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of products, like threads, needles and clothing for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Yaroslav

texts.ru:
Ярослав живет в городе Хуст, Западная Украина. Он торгует на одном из местных рынков женской одеждой по сезону, а именно колготками, лосинами, гольфами, кофтами и блузами. Вначале трудно было начинать этот бизнес, но потом Ярослав наладил поставку товара и бизнес стал развиваться. 
Ярославу понадобилась сумма в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить партию лосин и колгот для весеннего сезона, а также блузки и кофточки. Ярослав планирует улучшать условия проживания своей семьи и постепенно расширять бизнес, копя деньги на образование детей.
texts.en:
Yaroslav lives in the Western Ukrainian city of Khryst. He sells seasonal women's clothing - stockings, leggings, turtlenecks, jackets, and shirts - at a local market. Initially, it was difficult for him to start his business, but once Yaroslav established a product assortment, his business began to develop. 

Yaroslav needs 20,000 griven in order to purchase shirts and jackets as well as leggings and stockings for the spring season. He plans to improve the living standard of his family and gradually expand his business while saving money for his childrens' education.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of shirts and jackets as well as leggings and stockings for spring.

loans.name: Marlene Emperatriz

texts.es:
La señora Marlene Emperatriz es originaria de diriamba Carazo pero desde hace años se traslado a vivir a Managua por circunstancia de la vida, donde ella se desempeña como maestra de primaria desde hace quince año en un colegio del estado. 

Solicita un  préstamo a ceprodel para invertirlo en  compra  de  útiles escolares  tales como uniforme, mochila, cuaderno. Esto con el propósito de dar a su hija una buena educación para que el futuro sea toda una profesional.

Confía en dios y pide el apoyo a kiva a través de ceprodel para que le faciliten este crédito ya que sin ello no puede cumplir el sueño de su hija ya que actualmente gana muy poco.
texts.en:
Marlene is originally from Diriamba, in Carazo, Nicaragua, but, due to certain circumstances, some years ago she moved to Managua.  There she is a primary school teacher.  She has been working in a state school for 15 years.

She has come to Ceprodel for a loan to invest in buying school materials such as a uniform, backpack and notebooks.  With this she will be able to give her daughter a good education so that she can be a professional in her future.

She has faith in God and is asking Kiva for support, through Ceprodel, so that she can have this loan.  Without it, her daughter will not be able to realise her dream as Marlene currently earns very little money.

loans.use: to buy school materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a glass cabinet, pay for renovations and buy stock (basic household goods).

loans.name: Fausta

texts.en: Fausta is a 39-year-old married woman with three children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She is a primary teacher, and her parents inspired her to go into service. After realizing that teaching alone could not guarantee that she would be able to pay her family's daily expenses, she bought land and now practices commercial agriculture. Pests and diseases are her major challenges. Her dream is to buy more land and grow a variety of crops. Fausta intends to use the loan to buy farming inputs such as seedlings and fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy farming inputs such as seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Aida

texts.en: This time, for her sixth loan cycle, Aida is borrowing 10,000 PHP to buy more coconut for her copra business. The fish vending business that she previously funded through NWTF, a Kiva field partner, continues to provide for Aida and her family and help them to increase their income to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more coconut for her copra business.

loans.name: Delma

texts.en:
Delma is 43 years old and married with nine children. Six of her children are in school. She works very hard to provide for them.

Delma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of items to sell.

She has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as sardines, snack foods, detergent, and other groceries. 

In the future, Delma would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of items to sell.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is a business lady who sells charcoal to earn a living.  She had requested a previous loan which she used to buy more stocks of charcoal. Her business improved, and she repaid her loan. She has requested a loan of 10,428 KES to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children

loans.name: Maxima

texts.es: Máxima, de 51 años de edad, casada, madre de 2 hijos, es dueña de una pequeña pulpería en la ciudad de Estelí. Inicio con muy poco capital, no vendía muchos productos poco a poco a cómo podía cada centavo lo invertía en la pulpería con el objetivo de lograr mejorarla cada día. Busco financiamiento para comprar otros productos que no  tenía y que sus clientes le solicitaban.  Después de un tiempo fue adquiriendo más clientela esto le lleno de mucho orgullo pues ha logrado generar ingresos por sí misma y aportar en el hogar.  Está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar  granos básico, aceite, papel higiénico, jabón, jugos, agua embotellada, leche , avenas , enlatados. Dentro de sus planes futuros desea convertir su pulpería en una distribuidora.
texts.en: 51-year-old Máxima, who is married with 2 children, owns a small grocery store in the city of Estelí.  As she started out with very little capital, she did not sell many goods, but gradually, whenever she could, she invested every centavo in the grocery store with the aim of making improvements every day.  She is seeking funding to buy other products that she did not have and for which there was a demand from her customers.  After a time, she started to build up her clientele and this has filled her with pride as she has managed to generate income for herself and for her household.  She is applying for funding to buy basic grains, oil, toilet paper, soap, fruit juices, bottled water, milk, oats and tinned goods.  One of her plans for the future is to convert her grocery store into a wholesale business.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, toilet paper, soap, fruit juices, bottled water, milk, oats and tinned goods.

loans.name: Lecheritas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “LECHERITAS”  iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Miriam es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ganado, producción de hortalizas, venta de leches, costura de busos, tienda de barrio, venta de verduras, panadería.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Miriam es integrante, ella indica que hace seis meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de comercio de leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su suegra, después de su matrimonio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de una vaca lechera) que adquirirá de las comunidades aledañas y posteriormente a la crianza lo comercializará en su puesto fijo. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones del área de salud y de crédito.
texts.en:
The "Lecheritas" communal bank will begin its second loan cycle with Pro Mujer, through the Patacamaya regional office.  The group has eight members, directed by a board, the president of which is Miriam.  The members of the communal bank have various types of business, including: cattle selling, producing vegetables, selling milk, blouse-making, grocery stores, selling vegetables and selling bread.

The loan that the group is taking out will benefit the small businesswomen who are members of the same communal bank as Miriam.  She says she joined Pro Mujer six months ago after someone from the institution visited her at home offered her an invitation.  She currently has a milk business, and says she learned this trade from her mother-in-law after she married.

The loan she is taking out is to increase her capital to purchase a dairy cow which she will buy in the neighbouring communities.  Then the capital will go to raising the animal and then selling milk from her fixed post.  This type of work allows Miriam to earn the money to maintain her household as best as possible.  She is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health education and education on the loans.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for her pharmacy.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es:
Amparo tiene 60 años y aún tiene grandes sueños por cumplir. Su vida siempre ha estado colmada con grandes regalos, el mejor, dice ella fue haber tenido su hijo y compartir su vida con un gran hombre. Aunque su situación económica nunca ha sido la mejor le sobran motivos para sonreír. Ama a su familia y es esta quien la llena de fuerzas para seguir adelante. Desde hace más de 30 años, esta mujer labora en sector de la confección directa, realizando prendas para el hogar y arreglos de modistería desde su casa, lo cual le permitió estar pendiente de su familia. Con su actividad logró brindarle a su hijo educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
Su mayor sueño es disfrutar cada día de su bello hogar y no preocuparse por banalidades en la vida. Ama su trabajo como confeccionista, además de ser su gran pasión, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de telas para la confección de ropa escolar, con el fin de aprovechar la temporada estudiantil.
texts.en: Amparo is 60 and still has big ambitions which she wants to fulfil.  Her life has always been filled with great gifts, the best of which, she says, are having had her son and sharing her life with a great man.  Although her financial situation has never been the best, she has ample reasons to smile.  She loves her family and it is they who give her the strength to go on.  For more than 30 years, she has produced and sold clothing directly, producing household textiles and doing clothing alterations from her home and, thereby, providing for her family.  With her business she managed to provide an education and a better quality of life for her son.  Her greatest ambition is to enjoy each day in her beautiful home and not to have to worry about the trivialities of life.  She loves her work as a seamstress and, what is more, sewing is her great passion.  For this reason, she aims to capitalise on the new school term by applying for a loan to purchase fabric for making school uniforms.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Serge Bruno

texts.fr: Serge est un homme de 31 ans, marié et père de 2 enfants. Actif depuis 01 an, il vend des beignets dans un quartier de la ville. Il sollicite le crédit pour acheter des matières premières (farine, sucre, levure, accessoires des beignets)pour augmenter son niveau de stock qui est moyen et afin d'accroître son chiffre d'affaires ainsi que son profit. le profit dégagé sera utilisé pour réinvestir dans son activité et le reste pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa famille (éducation de ses enfants, nutrition et santé)
texts.en: Serge is a 31-year-old man who is married and the father of 2 children. He has been selling doughnuts in a district of town for a year. He is requesting this loan so that he can buy ingredients (flour, sugar, yeast, doughnut trimmings) in order to raise his moderate inventory level and increase his sales and profits. Some of the profit generated will be reinvested in his business and the rest will be used to satisfy his family's needs (his children's education, food and healthcare).

loans.use: to buy ingredients with which to make doughnuts.

loans.name: Tupendane Group

texts.fr: Farida est présidente de l'association de credit Tupendane/Miti. Leader courage et ambitieuse, elle est âgée de 39ans, mère de 7 enfants dont 5scolarisés et mariée à un policier. Engagée dans le petit commerce au centre commercial de Miti, elle sollicite un nouveau crédit pour l'achat des divers denrées alimentaires (oeufs, poissons salés, fretin, tourteau, beignets, etc.). Elle espère accroitre sa petite unité de production avec l'appui de Hekima mais craint la vente à crédit comme il y a pas de cash circulant. La cliente remercie Hekima.
texts.en: Farida is the president of the loan association Tupendane/Miti. A courageous and ambitious leader, she is 39 years old, married to a police officer and the mother of 7 children, 5 of whom attend school. She is a small trader in the commercial centre of Miti and is requesting a new loan so that she can buy various food items (eggs, salted fish, small fry, canola, doughnuts, etc.). She hopes to increase her small output with Hekima's help, but is worried about having to sell on credit as there is no money circulating. The customer thanks Hekima.

loans.use: to buy various food items (eggs, salted fish, small fry, canola, doughnuts, etc.)

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
Ana de 46 años, es madre soltera de un hijo de 21 años de edad. Su pareja nunca se hizo responsable, por lo cual esta mujer se dedicó a laborar con el fin de generar ingresos para educar a su hijo. Laboró por mucho tiempo como empleada del servicio, pero su hijo  se enfermó y se vio en la obligación de retirarse para cuidarlo. En medio de su crisis económica debido a que su trabajo era la única fuente de ingresos. Ana decidió dedicarse a la venta de mercancía por catálogo desde su casa a vecinos y familiares, lo que le permitió estar pendiente del cuidado de su hijo.
Con esta actividad ha logrado sostener su hogar y brindarle educación a su hijo. En la actualidad busca mejorar su situación económica por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito que destinará en la compra de ropa y accesorios con el fin de aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Ana is 46 years old. She is a single mother of a 21 year old son. Her spouse never took responsibility, so she decided yo work to generate income to raise her son. She worked for a long time as maid, but her son became ill and she had to leave to take care of him. In the middle of a financial crisis because her job was her only source of income, Ana decided to sell merchandise via catalog from her home to neighbors and family. This allowed her to be around to take care of her son. 

With this activity, she has been able to support her home and offer her son an education. Right now, she is seeking to improve her financial situation and so she is asking for a loan she will use to buy clothing and accessories in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing and accessories)

loans.name: Ezequiel

texts.es: Ezequiel es un joven de 36 años de edad, casado, padre de dos hijos de 12 y 6 años de edad, quienes cursan en la escuela primaria; Ezequiel es propietario de  un taller de pintado y enderezado automotriz, dentro de su taller también ofrece el servicio de soldadura, instaló el taller desde hace nueve años, el cual está ubicado dentro de su vivienda, lo hizo con pocos ahorros que tenía, luego con la ayuda de los créditos ha logrado mejorar poco a poco su negocio , el aprendió el oficio trabajando en otros talleres y solicita el crédito para hacerle mejoras a su taller y ofrecer un mejor servicio a su clientela. Una de sus metas es seguir mejorando el taller para obtener más ingresos para así realizar mejoras en su vivienda. Ezequiel está muy agradecido con  la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobres como Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: Ezequiel is e 36 year old man and the father of two children, aged 12 and 6. They are in primary school. Ezequiel is the owner of a automobile paint and bodywork shop. He also does welding in his shop. He opened his shop nine years ago. It is located at his house and he opened it with the small savings that he had. Later, with the help of loans, he has been able to improve his business little by little. He learned his trade working in other shops and is asking for the loan to do some improvements on his shop and offer his customers a better service. One of his goals is to keep improving the shop in order to obtain more income and be able to do some home improvements. Ezequiel is very grateful for the help the Kiva investors offer people of low income and in poor countries such as Nicaragua, so that they may have dignified work.

loans.use: to improve his establishment to give his customers a better service.

loans.name: Upole Group

texts.fr: Madame Cibalonza femme dynamique, présidente du groupe Upole est mariée à un homme d'affaire. Agée de 28ans est mère de 8 enfants dont seulement 5 sont scolarisés. Elle débuta le commerce à l’âgé de 15ans grâce aux fonds reçu de son père avant d’adhérer dans le groupe Upole. Engagée dans la commercialisation de haricot qu'elle achète de Goma, elle sollicite ce nouveau crédit pour s’approvisionner avec 600kgs de haricots. La cliente remercie sincèrement Hekima et pense que toutes les femmes qui remboursement normalement le crédit  iront toujours de l'avant.
texts.en: Madam Cibalonza is a dynamic woman, president of the group Upole, and married to a businessman. Twenty-eight years old, she is mother to 8 children of whom only 5 go to school. She started in business at 15 thanks to the funds received from her father before joining the group Upole. Involved in the commercialisation of beans which she buys in Goma, she is requesting this new loan to supply herself with 600kgs of beans. The client sincerely thanks Hekima and thinks that all the women who properly repay the loan will always get ahead.

loans.use: to buy 600kgs of beans.

loans.name: Ana Teresa

texts.es:
Ana Teresa de 64 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Santa Bárbara, Colombia. Toda su vida le ha gustado trabajar y desde hace 25 años tiene su puesto de trabajo en el parque principal en donde comercializa prendas de vestir masculinas y femeninas. Sus mejores clientes son los campesinos de las zonas aledañas al municipio.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener un almacén ubicado en un local, ya que su mayor dificultad es el clima, que en temporada de lluvia, obliga a Ana a recoger su surtido, causándole pérdidas monetarias.

En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de mercancía, con el fin de surtir su negocio y mejorar sus ventas. Espera poder disfrutar de una linda vejez con sus cuatro hijos, ya que su esposo falleció hace algunos años.
texts.en: Ana Teresa, who is 64, lives in the town of Santa Bárbara in Colombia.  She has always enjoyed working and, for 25 years, she has had her stall in the main park, where she sells men's and women's clothing.  Her best customers are the farmers in the regions bordering the town.  Ana’s greatest dream is to have proper business premises, as the biggest problem she faces is the climate which, in the rainy season, forces her to pack up her stock and lose money.  She is currently applying for a loan to buy merchandise with which to stock her stall and improve her sales.  She hopes to be able to enjoy a pleasant old age with her four children, as she lost her husband several years ago.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing)

loans.name: Abdourahmane

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdourahmane, âgé de 57 ans est père de 18 enfants dont l’ainé a 32 ans et le cadet, 10 ans. Il est chauffeur de profession depuis 39 ans dans une banque de la place.  Il commence sa journée à 8h 15mn pour descendre à 17h. Le reste de son temps il le passe dans son chantier à superviser les travaux. Il a embrassé le métier par amour. Avec son revenu plus ou moins consistant il ne peut que recourir à des Institutions financières comme l’IMCEC pour réaliser ses objectifs. Il sollicite un crédit pour la clôture de sa maison. Son seul objectif est de terminer la construction  de son local pour être à l’aise avec sa famille.
texts.en: Mister Abdourahmane, 57 years old, is father to 18 children of whom the oldest is 32 years old and the youngest 10 years old. He has been a driver by profession for 39 years in a local bank. He starts his day at 8:15am to finish at 5pm. He spends the rest of his time on his building site supervising the work. He embraced his profession with love. With his more or less consistent revenue he can only resort to financial institutions like UIMCEC to realize his objectives. He is requesting a loan for the fence of his home. His only objective is to finish the construction of his locale to be comfortable with his family.

loans.use: to build the fence of his home.

loans.name: Absatou

texts.fr:
Mlle Absatou, âgée de 25 ans est une jeune commerçante de par l’âge mais aussi l’expérience dans ce domaine puisqu’elle en a qu’un an. Elle est célibataire sans enfant, et en est à sa première expérience de crédit. Avec ce dernier elle pourra acheter des tissus en variété pour revendre dans le quartier et les environs ou elle possède une clientèle pas mal.
