A partir de là elle pourra commencer à épargner et penser sérieusement à son avenir. Elle n’a pas de charges sinon ses propres besoins.
Comme projet futur, elle désire élargir son activité et surtout la diversifier.
texts.en: Mademoiselle Absatou, 25 years old, is a young shopkeeper by age but also by her experience in this domain because she only has one year's experience. She is single without children, and is on her first loan experience. With this loan she will be able to buy a variety of fabric to resell in the neighborhood and surroundings where she has not a bad clientele. From here she will be able to begin to save and think seriously about her future. She has no responsibilities other than her own needs. As a future project, she wants to expand her business and especially diversify it.

loans.use: to buy fabric to resell.

loans.name: Berta Luz

texts.es:
Berta Luz de 59 años de edad, es una campesina desplazada por la violencia con su núcleo familiar por los grupos al margen de la ley. Por lo cual residen en el municipio de Yarumal, Colombia. Allí comenzaron una nueva vida. Su esposo que se ha dedicado desde su juventud a la agricultura, logró emplearse en una finca en donde labora realizando actividades agrícolas. 
Berta desde hace dos años por sugerencia de una amiga inició con la producción de arepas para la venta puerta a puerta. En la actualidad se encuentra produciendo 200 arepas diarias las cuales distribuye en restaurantes y cafeterías de su localidad. 
Hoy se encuentra en búsqueda de un crédito con el propósito de comprar un molino eléctrico que le ayudará a disminuir tiempo en la producción y desgaste físico, compra de parrillas y maiz. 
Su mayor sueño es poder convertir su negocio en una microempresa, con el fin de crear fuentes de empleo y garantizarles a sus cuatro hijos mejores oportunidades educativos.
texts.en:
Berta Luz is 59 years old. She is a farmer who was displaced with her family by violence committed by groups of outlaws. Because of this, they live in the town of  Yarumal, Colombia. That is where they started a new life. Her husband has been a farmer since he was young and he was able to get a job at a farm where he does agricultural work.

For two years, Berta, at a friend's suggestion, started making arepas to sell door to door. Right now, she produces 200 arepas a day which she distributes to restaurants and cafeterias in her community.

Today she is seeking a loan to buy an electric grinder, which will help her cut down the preparation time and physical effort, as well as to buy grills  and corn. Her biggest dream is to make her business into a micro-business so she can create a source of employments and guarantee her four children better educational opportunities.

loans.use: to buy an electric grinder, grills and corn.

loans.name: Aby

texts.fr:
Madame Aby, une dame de 42 ans, mariée et mère de 5 enfants dont le plus âgé a 22 ans et le plus jeune, 7 ans. Elle travaille dans une boite de la place et commence sa journée à 8h 15mn, pour descendre à 18h le soir. Elle a une expérience de 5 ans dans ce domaine. Pour ce qui concerne ses dépenses, elle se prend elle-même en charge. Elle a déjà eu un crédit et veut renouveler afin d’appuyer  socialement son père qui fait des activités commerciales.
Par contre elle aimerait ouvrir une boutique de prêt à porter et de tissus voilà son vœu le plus cher.
texts.en: Madam Aby, a 42 year old woman, is married and mother to 5 children of whom the oldest is 22 years old and the youngest is 7 years old. She works in a local company and starts her day at 8:15am to finish at 6pm at night. She has 5 years experience in this domain. For that which concerns her expenses, she takes care of herself. She has already had a loan and wants to renew in order to socially support her father who is in commercial business. On the other hand she would like to open a boutique of ready-to-wear clothing and fabric, this is her dearest wish.

loans.use: to help her father to strengthen his commercial business.

loans.name: Théodore

texts.fr: Théodore est un jeune Camerounais âgé de 36 ans qui mène comme activité la fabrication artisanale et vente des pièces détachées automobiles telles que les cylimbloques qui servent à garnir les freins des véhicules. il bénéficie de 02 années d'expérience dans ce domaine. il voudrait avec ce crédit effectuer des travaux d’aménagement de son site afin de la rendre moderne et un peu plus attractif. il compte faire des économies pour ouvrir un garage
texts.en: Théodore is a young, 36-year-old Cameroonian man who crafts and sells car spare parts, like silent blocks which are used with car brakes. He has 2 years of experience in this line of work. He would like to use this loan to carry out some refurbishment work on his work site in order to modernise it and make it a bit more attractive. He plans to build his savings so that he can open a garage.

loans.use: to carry out refurbishment work.

loans.name: Kellen

texts.en: Kellen, a 49-year-old married mother of five living in Kamwenge, Uganda, operates a retail shop, earns a salary as a teacher, and also has a cattle farm. With the money earned she has been able to pay school fees for her children, and one is now at the University. Her dream is to see her children attain degrees as minimum qualifications and also to own a wholesale shop. Kellen intends to use this loan to fence her farm.

loans.use: to fence her farm.

loans.name: Nilma

texts.en:
Nilma is a 42-year-old woman living in Bohol, Philippines. She is married and has three children. She and her husband have a fishing business. 

Nilma is asking for a loan to buy materials for repairing their boat, such as plywood, nails and paint. 

With these items they will be able to maintain the good working condition of the boat and eventually improve their fishing business.

loans.use: to buy materials for repairing a fishing boat.

loans.name: Myra

texts.en:
Myra is 38 years old and married. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been doing this for ten years and also earns additional income by raising ducks.

Myra is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gisele Stephanie

texts.fr: Gisele stephanie est une femme de 40 ans mariée mèer de 05 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle vend du poisson  fumé dans un marché de la place. engagée dans cette activité depuis plus de  6 ans son activité marche bien car elle maitrise l'environnement de son marché. Elle sollicite le crédit pour augmenter son capital compte tennue de la demande croissante envue de fournir la quantitée demandé par ses clients;etendre son activitée et. le profit degagé sera utiliser pour payer les etudes de ses enfants et le reste re-investi dans son activité.
texts.en: Gisele Stephanie is a 40 year old woman, married and mother to 5 children all in school. She sells smoked fish at a local market. Involved in this business for more than 6 years her business functions well as she masters the environment of her market. She is requesting the loan to increase her capital taking account of the growing demand with the vision of supplying the quantity requested by her customers and to extend her business. The profit generated will be used to pay for the studies of her children and the rest reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to buy cartons of fish to smoke and sell.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en:
Andrew is a 56-year-old married man with seven children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He is a cattle farmer and also grows maize and sorghum. Every day he sells 20 litres of milk at 1000 Ugandan shillings each. Diseases and limited farmland pose a challenge to the growth of his business.

Andrew intends to use his loan to buy cattle for rearing.

His dream is to set up a milk processing plant.

loans.use: to buy cattle for rearing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of gowns, dresses, tuxedos and slacks.

loans.name: Alassane

texts.fr:
Monsieur Alassane est un homme de 54 ans qui est entré très vite dans le biseness ; cela fait 24 ans maintenant. Il est marié et père de 21 enfants dont le plus âgé a 27 ans et le cadet, 1 an. Avec  le nombre considérable de sa progéniture, Alassane est obligé de travailler dure pour nourrir sa famille. C’est un boulanger de profession mais cela ne l’empêche pas de faire de la vente de produits divers afin de maximiser son profit. Sur la photo on peut voire comment il s’active dans son travail et cela d’une telle assiduité car il adore son métier. Il démarre sa journée à 6h du matin pour descendre à 19h du soir. Il a besoin de 400000Fcfa pour acheter de la marchandise diverse alimentaire et revendre.
Il rêve un jour d’ouvrir un grand magasin d’alimentation général et une boulangerie moderne.
texts.en: Mister Alassane is a 54 year old man who entered very quickly into business; it has been 24 years now. He is married and father to 21 children of whom the oldest is 27 years old and the youngest 1 year old. With the considerable number of his offspring, Alassane is obliged to work hard to feed his family. He is a baker by profession but this does not prevent him from selling various products in order to maximize his profit. In the photo we can see how he is active in his work and with such diligence as he loves his profession. He starts his day at 6am in the morning to finish at 7pm at night. He dreams of opening a large general food store and a modern bakery one day.

loans.use: to buy various foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy 25kg of manioc flours, corn, spices, etc.

loans.name: Georgette Solange

texts.fr: Georgette est une camerounaise de 33 ans, mariée et mère de 2 enfants. Elle possède et gère un petit pressing depuis 15 ans dans un quartier de la ville. Dynamique et chaleureuse, elle voudrait augmenter sa capital matériel pour satisfaire sa clientèle grandissante. Ce crédit qu'elle sollicite va lui permettre d'acheter une machine à laver. Les bénéfices générés seront réinvestis dans l'activité pour l'agrandir, ouvrir une bcentre bureautique et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Georgette is a 33 year old Camerounian married woman and mother of two children. For the past 15 years she has owned and managed a small dry cleaning operation in a neighborhood of the city in which she lives. She is dynamic and charismatic, and hopes to increase her equipment in order to satisfy an ever growing number of customers. The loan she is asking for will enable her to purchase a washing machine. Profits from her activity will be re-invested into the business to further its growth, including an adminstrative 'center', and to attend to the needs of her family.

loans.use: purchase a washing machine

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 26 years old, married and supporting a family of three. He has been running a tailoring business for the last eight years, making a monthly income of 27,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). 

He is applying for his first loan of 20,000 KES from KADET LTD. He plans to buy materials for dressmaking. 

He will purchase more clothing materials with the anticipated profits. 

His future dream is to expand the business.

loans.use: to buy clothing materials for tailoring.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is an 48 years old married woman with two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Elizabeth has a ready-to-wear business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years. 

She is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy blouses, trousers, shorts etc. for resale.

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy blouses, trousers, shorts etc. for resale

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 49 years old and married with three children. With two children currently in school, Evelyn works very hard to provide for them.

Evelyn runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 20000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase shampoo, eggs, snack foods, sugar, groceries and other items to sell in her general store. 

Evelyn has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, eggs, snack foods, sugar, and groceries.

In the future, Evelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, eggs, snack foods, sugar, groceries and other items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Prescila

texts.en: Prescila is a 23-year-old woman and the mother of a 3-year-old daughter from Bohol, Philippines. Prescila has been engaged in a sari-sari or variety store business for several years now. She is asking for a loan to buy additional stock to sell, like rice, canned goods, noodles, beverages, food seasonings, soap and toiletries. With this, she will be able to sell more items to her customers, thus augmenting her profit and income. In the future, Prescila hopes of expanding her store and saving money for the future schooling of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell, like rice, canned goods, noodles, beverages, food seasonings, soap and toiletries.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 61 years old, married, and has five children. She is selling grocery items to the people in her village and gains about P5,000 each month. It goes for the family's subsistance. She hopes to keep selling good products and to increase sales; that is why she is asking for a loan of P8,000 to buy more merchandise such as canned goods, noodles, eggs, soap and shampoo to sell in her store. 

Cecilia will keep adding good products and services to achieve the good development of her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, eggs, soap and shampoo to sell in her store.

loans.name: Rosefe

texts.en:
Rosefe is 45 years old and has four children. She is married and has three children who are in school. Rosefe is in an agricultural business in the Philippines. She has been in business for 15 years now, and has borrowed 5 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. 

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, Rosefe would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина – из Гладковки. Она занимается теплицами в своем селе уже 20 лет. У неё есть 36 соток собственной земли, и ещё дополнительно 11 соток она арендует у соседа. На этом участке Ирина выращивает ранние, средние и поздние овощи, а именно помидоры, огурцы, а также белокачанную и цветную капусту.  
Сумма в 15 000 гривен понадобилась Ирине для того, чтобы закупить удобрения, пленку, семена и построить дополнительную теплицу в преддверии нового сельскохозяйственного сезона.
texts.en:
Irina is from Gladkovka. She has been involved in the greenhouse business for 20 years now. She has her own plot of land which is 36 are in size (1 are is equal to 100 square meters), and rents another 11 are from a neighbour. On this land she grows early, mid, and late vegetables, in  particular, tomatoes, cucumbers, cabbage and cauliflower. 
Irina needs to borrow 15,000 Ukrainian Hryvnya to buy fertilizer, plastic covering, and seeds, and to build another greenhouse in anticipation of the new growing season.

loans.use: to build another greenhouse and to purchase fertilizer, seeds, and plastic covering

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.en:
Ramona is a 56-year-old married woman and the mother of nine children. They live in Bohol, Philippines. Ramona and her husband have been engaged in a fishing business for more than 30 years now. This is the source of their income.

Ramona dreams of expanding their fishing business but lacks the financial resources to do so. Because of this, she is applying for a loan to buy a new fishing boat, fishing nets and buckets. With this, her husband will be able to enhance his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market and augment their profit and income.

loans.use: to buy new fishing boat, fishing nets and buckets

loans.name: Marichu

texts.en:
Marichu is 42 years old and married with five children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Marichu has a fishing business in the Philippines. Marichu requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy a new engine and repair her fishing boat.

Marichu has been in this business for 21 years. In the future, Marichu would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a new engine and repair her fishing boat

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is 60 years old and married with five children. Ofelia works very hard to provide for them.

Ofelia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, sugar, canned goods, snack foods, groceries, etc., to sell in her general store.

Ofelia has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, sugar, canned goods, snack foods, groceries, etc.

In the future Ofelia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, sugar, canned goods, snack foods, groceries, etc., to sell in her general store

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 11,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more dried fish to sell.

Norma successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is relisting Norma's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase dried fish to sell

loans.name: Evelinda

texts.en:
Evelinda is 44 years old, married, and has two children who are both in school. Evelinda works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

She has been in this business for 22 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, soft drinks, shampoo and other miscellaneous items. In the future, Evelinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Janice

texts.en:
“Faith and determination will prevail you.” This is a phrase spoken by a 30-year-old woman who is engaged in a general store business. She believes in the phrase because most of the successful persons she knows are victorious because of faith and hard work. She really admires them because she was influenced by these very good traits.  

Now, she wants to make her own identity to lift up her living from insufficiency. She is wishing to expand her business so that her income will increase. At the present she is requesting a loan of PHP 35,000 to purchase canned goods, biscuits, coffee, juice, shampoo, sugar and cooking oil. She hopes to win in this battle for the continuous improvement of her living and in providing satisfaction in the life that God has given to her.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, biscuits, coffee, juice, shampoo, sugar and cooking oil.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 50 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a direct selling business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy products like lotion, shampoo, lipsticks, perfumes, etc. to sell in her store.

She has borrowed and paid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the direct selling business for 1 year and also earns an income from a general store. Teresita aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy products like lotion, shampoo, lipsticks, perfumes, etc. to sell in her store.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 52 years old and married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a dried fish vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for two years.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish and ingredients for her dried fish. In the future, Lucy would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish and ingredients for her dried fish.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Rosario is 40 years old and married with six children. Five of her children are in school, and she works very hard to provide for them.

Rosario runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Rosario has been in this business for 15 years. She sells a variety of items such as sugar, bread, sardines and other groceries. 

In the future, Rosario would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 55 years old and married with twelve children. With six children currently in school, Erlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Erlinda runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy shampoo, biscuits, egg, can goods, groceries and other items to sell in her general store.

Erlinda has been in this business for 2 years. She sells a variety of items,such as shampoo, biscuits, egg, can goods, and groceries. 

In the future, Erlinda would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, biscuits, egg, can goods, groceries and other items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Joselina

texts.en:
Joselina is 42 years old, married, and lives peacefully in Solana with her spouse and children. Joselina has a business selling livestock feed to the people in their village. She gains minimal income in her business but she manages her income well for their sustenance. She appreciates her family's thriftiness.

She would like to increase her sales, and that is why she is now asking for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy more sacks of livestock feed to sell. This will increase her profits as well. Someday, with continuous perseverance, Joselina will develop her business and improve her family's current living situation.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of livestock feed to sell.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 48 years old and married with six children. Two of her children are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Rosalia has a fishing business in the Philippines. Rosalia requested a 13,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

Rosalia has been in this business for twenty years. In the future, Rosalia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is 42 years old and married with two children. With her children currently in school, she works very hard to provide for them. Shirley runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase items to sell in her general store, like shampoo, canned goods, sugar, oil, groceries, etc. In the future Shirley would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell, like shampoo, canned goods, sugar, oil, groceries, etc. in her general store.

loans.name: Ma.theresa

texts.en:
Ma.Theresa is 48 years old and married with two children, one of whom is in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a clothing sales business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years.

She requested a PHP 21,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items like blouses, pants, jewelry and other ready-to-wear clothing. In the future, Ma.Theresa would like to save enough to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items like blouses, pants, jewelry and other ready-to-wear clothing.

loans.name: Andrei

texts.ru:
Андрей – фермер-огородник. Он живёт в селе Хатки, в южном регионе Украины и уже 13 лет занимается тепличным хозяйством. Андрей с самого начала взял в аренду 6 больших теплиц, чтобы выращивать в них ранние редис, капусту и перец. 
Андрею понадобилась сумма в 15 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить удобрения и химию, семена, дрова, пленку и капельные шланги, а также нанять работников на посев редиски и высадку рассады.
texts.en: Andrei is a garden-farmer. He lives in the village of Khatki in southern Ukraine. For the last 13 years, he has been in the greenhouse business. From the very beginning, Andrei has rented 6 large greenhouses where he grows early radishes, cabbages, and peppers. Andrei now needs a loan of 15,000 Ukrainian Hryvnya to buy fertilizers and chemicals, seeds, firewood, plastic covering and hoses for drip irrigation, as well as to hire workers to help with planting radishes and transplanting.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and chemicals, seeds, firewood, plastic covering and hoses for drip irrigation, as well as to hire workers to help with planting radishes and transplanting

loans.name: Rodah

texts.en:
Rodah is 45 years old and lives with her two children, ages 17 and 12. She still runs her cereal business, and her monthly income has increased to 15,000 KES.

She is now servicing her second loan of 20,000 KES from KADET LTD and will to use this amount to stock more dry beans and maize for resale.  

The anticipated profits from the business will be ploughed back into her business. She hopes to educate her children and prosper in her business.

loans.use: to purchase dry maize and beans for resale.

loans.name: Roxanne

texts.en:
Roxanne is 25 years old, married, and has two children. She works very hard to provide for them. Roxanne runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Roxanne has been in this business for 12 years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, and other miscellaneous items. In the future Roxanne would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Kerstine

texts.en:
Kerstine, a 27-year-old married mother of one child, works very hard to provide for her family. For the past three years she has been running a general store in the Philippines selling a variety of items such as shampoo, sugar, biscuits, egg, groceries, etc.

Kerstine has requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase more such items to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase items to sell such as shampoo, sugar, biscuits, egg, groceries, etc. in her general store

loans.name: Danilo

texts.en:
Danilo is a rice grower in Alcala. He lives with his wife and two children. He plants and harvests rice to sell. Through his income in selling the rice crop, Danilo is able to send his children to school and provide their school fees. He was determined to send them to school because he has no legacy other than a good education for them. Danilo usually gains about P25,000 each harvest season twice a year. 

His crops need farm supplies; that is why he is asking for a loan of P50,000 to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming. It will help nourish his crops for better production. With good income from the business, Danilo will continue to give the best education to his children and will improve the family's living conditions as well.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies, such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides used in farming.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is 49 years old and married with seven children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and has been in this business for five years.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing nets and other equipment. In the future, Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and other equipment.

loans.name: Heraldo

texts.en:
Heraldo, age 19, is a young farmer who lives in the beautiful village of Laguna, a few miles off the Southern highway.  The village is named Laguna because it houses a lagoon with various species of birds. He is currently living with his parents along with his older brother and younger sister. His dad recently passed his cacao farm onto Heraldo to instead focus on his annatto and ginger farm. 

Besides his cacao farm, Heraldo also grows other crops like bananas, plantains, coconuts, corn and other ground foods for home use. “I like to drink a glass of cacao before going to the farm so that I can have energy to work,” says Heraldo. He likes cacao farming because there is a good market for it. To protect his cacao and practice the sport, Heraldo goes out hunting cacao-eating animals. His favorite part of cacao farming is pruning, because he knows it’s an investment to make his trees more productive in the upcoming season.

Heraldo, who farms six acres, has a passion for cacao and spends most of his time on his farm on small tasks like removing suckers and infected pods. When referring to suckers, farmers mean excess branches on their cacao, which “suck” the plant’s energy away from the fruit pods to the branches. At harvesting time the entire family pitches in to get the job done faster. Heraldo owns a horse and uses it to bring the wet beans home during peak season – March through May.  

Heraldo is requesting a loan to hire people in the community to help him clean and prune his cacao farm and establish a nursery for his first expansion. Cleaning is the process of chopping the entire overgrown bush around the farm to improve air circulation through the plants. Pruning is the process of removing of nonproductive branches from the trees and is performed to improve yields. Heraldo will establish a nursery so that he can have a centralized location to bag soil and expand his cacao farm with high yielding varieties.

loans.use: To clean, prune cacao and establish nursery

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is 36 years old and lives in Dela Paz, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children. 

Nida has a business buying and selling mangoes. She earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to purchase additional mango fruits to sell.

Nida has been a member of PMPC for almost 12 years. In the future, Nida hopes to engage in other types of business.

loans.use: to purchase additional mangoes to sell.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 32 years old, married and has three children. He earns a living as a tailor. He has employed two people in the business. He also does farming to generate more income. He has improved his business since he joined Faulu Kenya, thanks to the training he received in business management skills from Faulu Kenya.

John hopes to become more financially stable in the future. He needs a loan of 10,428 KES to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth, de 35 años es una mujer sencilla. Enviudó hace 4 años, desde entonces cuida de sus 3 hijos: Jesus, Jhosep y Angie a los que cuida en la casa que alquiló hace 6 años. Su trabajo desde 5 años se centra en la limpieza de una institución pública, ella recibe un pago mensual, por un contrato de un año, el cual cuida minuciosamente. “Tuve que postular a un concurso de limpieza anual, yo tengo que poner todo los productos de limpieza e insumos que se necesiten, cambio ellos me pagan el monto del servicio anual, pero en pagos mensuales”. Como el trabajo no es pesado ella misma trabaja en la limpieza de las instalaciones desde la mañana hasta el atardecer. Espera poder continuar con ese trabajo, está pensando más adelante tener trabajadores para ella y así concursar en la limpieza de diversas instituciones públicas mucho más grandes. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “niño Jesús” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP. Agradece la oportunidad de progreso, prometiendo ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Además gusta de pertenecer a su asociación, donde todos son unidos y solidarios.
Elizabeth, invertirá el dinero en la compra de productos de limpieza para desarrollar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 35, is an unassuming woman.  She was widowed four years ago, and ever since she has been raising her three children, Jesus, Jhosep, and Angie in the house she rented six years ago.

Her job for the past five years has been cleaning a public institution.  She receives her pay monthly for her contract of one year, and she takes great care with it.  “I had to apply for the annual cleaning contract.  I have to get  all of the cleaning products and supplies that are needed.  They, in turn, pay me the annual service amount, but in monthly payments.”

As the work is not difficult, she cleans the installations herself.  She does this from the morning until the evening.  She hopes to be able to continue with this work.  Later on, she is planning on having workers to do so.  This way she will apply to clean several much larger public institutions.

She belongs to the Niño Jesús communal bank, and this is her eighth loan with MFP.  She is grateful for the opportunity to progress.  She pledges to be punctual with her payments.  She likes belonging to her communal bank, where they are all close-knit and supportive.

Elizabeth will use the loan to buy cleaning products to do her work.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products to do her work.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en: Teresita is 42 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has been in this business for 3 years. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, eggs, sugar and other groceries in her general store. In the future Teresita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, eggs, sugar and other groceries in her general store.

loans.name: Kyobe

texts.en:
Kyobe is 40 years old and married. His four children are between the ages of 1 and 13. He sells human drugs and has been in operation for a period of three years, earning a monthly income of about KES 12,000. 

He is now servicing his third loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD and intends to use this amount to purchase drugs for resale. The profits he earns will be used to repay the loan and for the upkeep of his family. Kyobe hopes to educate his children and own a supermarket.

loans.use: To purchase drugs for his business.

loans.name: Dmitriy

texts.ru:
Дмитрий занимается выращиванием овощей в тепличных условиях в селе Гладковка. Этим бизнесом он занимается уже 21 год. На 33 сотках Дмитрий выращивает в теплицах 6 000 кустов ранних и поздних помидор, 3 000 кустов огурцов, 1 тонну редиса и 3 000 кустов перца.   
Дмитрий обратился к КИВА за дополнительными средствами в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить пленку, удобрения, семена и провести отопление в теплицах, чтобы подготовить их к сезону. Прибыль Дмитрий намеревается продолжать вкладывать в развитие своего хозяйства и постепенно развивать его дальше.
texts.en: Dmitriy earns a living by growing vegetables in greenhouses in the village of Gladkovka. He has been involved in this business for 21 years now. On a plot of land of 33 are (1 are is equal to 100 square meters), he grows 6,000 early and late tomato plants, 3,000 cucumber plants, 1 tonne of radishes, and 3,000 pepper plants. Dmitriy is now approaching Kiva for a second loan of 20,000 Ukrainian Hryvnya so he can buy plastic covering, fertilizers, and seeds, and to begin heating his greenhouses in order to prepare them for the growing season. He plans to use the profit generated by this loan to re-invest into his business and gradually develop it further.

loans.use: to buy plastic covering, fertilizers, and seeds, and to begin heating his greenhouses in order to prepare them for the growing season

loans.name: Hue's Group

texts.en:
Hue was born in 1970. She has two sons. The older son is learning in the 6th grade. The younger child is learning in the 4th grade. Her husband is a farmer. His income is about 2,000,000 VND per month. Hue collects iron scraps to earn a living. She also raises chickens to earn more money for her family. She gains about 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,000,000 VND per month. 

She began participating in SEDA's credit program in 2013. In this first loan, she would like to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. Her dream is for her children to have good careers.

Other members who are part of Hue's group include the following: 

Lieu was born in 1982. She has two children. She is a worker. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. 
Huong was born in 1974. She has two children. She is a worker. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for her pigs. 
Thanh was born in 1971. She has two children. She is a farmer. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to grow rice. 
Hang was born in 1977. She has three children. She raises pigs to earn a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to buy food for them.

loans.use: to buy food for her chickens.

loans.name: Seda

texts.en: Seda is involved in cattle breeding. Her livestock currently includes 3 cows, 2 pigs, 16 little pigs and 10 chickens. She is 59-year-old and lives with her son, daughter-in-law and 2 grandchildren. The family's only source of income is agriculture, so it is very difficult for Seda to cover the family's daily costs and at the same time keep the livestock. So, Seda applied for this loan to purchase forage for feeding the livestock. This will enable her to feed the livestock and continue the expansion of her farm. The loan is very important for Seda to gather high income and ensure a better life for her family.

loans.use: to pay for forage to feed the livestock.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафрузу 37 лет. Она очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Дилафруз замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она всегда стремится к новшеству и старается улучшить условию проживания. Дилафруз недавно участвовала в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес купле продажей продуктов питания. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 14500 сомони для покупки холодильника для продуктового магазина, так как она будет продавать молочные продукты. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Dilafruz is 37 years old. She is a very hard-working and kind woman. She is married and has 3 children. She always strives to innovate and tries to improve her standard of living. She recently completed a course entitled "Get Ahead" organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. She is now fully able to establish her own business and to become successful at it. She wants to start a business selling groceries. She plans to use the income she earns to provide her children with a good education and nutritional food. Dilafruz is seeking a loan of 14,500 Tajikistan Somoni to buy a refrigerator for her grocery store, as she will sell dairy products. She is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy fridge to set up a new business

loans.name: Mahmadullo

texts.ru: Махмадулло 42 года. У него жена и четверо детей. Махмадулло работает продавцом на рынке своего города. Он продает фрукты (яблоко, мандарин, гранат, бананы и т.д.). Он занимается продажей уже 4 года. Махмадулло хочет увеличить товарооборот и получить хорошую прибыль. Он берет кредит на сумму 5000 TJS для приобретения ассортимента товаров.
texts.en: Mahmadullo is 42 years old, married, and has 4 children. He works as a salesperson at the market of his hometown. He sells fruit (apples, mandarin oranges, pomegranates, bananas, and so on.) He has been doing this type of work for the last 4 years. He now wants to increase his turnover so he can earn a good profit. Mahmadullo is seeking a loan of 5,000 Tajikistan Somoni to purchase an assortment of fruit.

loans.use: To purchase an assortment of fruit

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 51 years old, a widow with five children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell.

Emma has been in this business for four years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Emma aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Flora Bernadette

texts.en:
Flora Bernadette lives at Tuguegarao. She is 33 years old, married, and has two children. She manages a beauty salon for income. Her spouse also helps her manage the business. They offer hair colorings, dyes and facial treatments. Flora had been in the business for over three years now. From the business, she is able to gain approximately P20,000 each month. She uses it for meals, school fees for her children and as revolving capital in the business in order to keep offering good services. 

She aims to keep extending friendly services and increase her income. That is why she is asking for a loan of P30,000 to buy medicines for hair treatments, curlers, colors and dyes to use in her salon. It will help satisfy customers with the good services they offer.

In the future, Flora Bernadette hopes to keep improving her business and become successful and financially stable.

loans.use: to buy medicines for hair treatments, curlers, colors and dyes to use in her salon.

loans.name: Analy

texts.en:
As a married parent of 5 children, Analy works hard to support her family. She has a restaurant business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store and a computer games business. She is borrowing PHP 19,000 through NWTF to buy vegetables, meat, chicken and more ingredients for her restaurant business.

Analy has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF, and more recently through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, chicken and more ingredients.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard  is aged thirty-seven, a farmer in Kitale county in Kenya where he lives with his wife  and three children who are all schooling. He has been in farming for the past four years producing maize, beans, milk and horticultural crops which he sells at the local market in his area.

He  is requesting a 31,200 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow. He will sell the milk and earn extra income which will help him boost his  family’s living standards and pay for his children’s schooling. He aspires to have bought two more high grade dairy cows in the next five years.

Diseases and fluctuation of prices are his major challenges in farming.

He is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for giving him the loan.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizers and maize seedlings.

loans.name: Cherelyn

texts.en:
Cherelyn is 34 years old and married with four children; three of her children are in school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. 

Cherelyn has a tricycle transportation business in the Philippines. Cherelyn requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy an additional tricycle.

Cherelyn has been in this business for six years.  In the future, Cherelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy an additional tricycle.

loans.name: Igor

texts.ru:
Игорь занимается огородничеством в селе Гладковка. На 22 сотках он выращивает в теплицах огурцы, ранний картофель. Тепличным хозяйством Игорь занимается уже 4 года.
Игорь обратился к КИВА за суммой в 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы приготовить теплицы к наступающему сезону. Полученную дополнительную прибыль Игорь собирается потратить на дальнейшее содержание и расширение своего тепличного бизнеса, а также нужды семьи.
texts.en: Igor is a produce farmer in the village of Gladovka. On 2,200 square meters [about one-fifth of a hectare] of land, he grows cucumbers in greenhouses as well as early potato varieties. Igor has been in greenhouse farming for four years. He applied to Kiva for a loan in the amount of 10,000 UAH in order to prepare his greenhouses for the upcoming agricultural season. Igor plans to use the resulting additional income to maintain and expand his farming business and also to provide for family needs.

loans.use: to prepare his greenhouses for the new agricultural season.

loans.name: Corazon

texts.en:
Corazon works hard to support her family. She is single and has a general store business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 1,800 through NWTF to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp because she wants to have backup light in case of emergency.

Corazon is aware that by using the solar lamp, she is saving money, helping the environment and reducing health and hazard risks to her family.

loans.use: to purchase a solar lamp.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en: Remedios is a 46-year-old married woman and mother of five children from Bohol, Philippines. She is engaged in fishing business together with her husband for more than 14 years now. They are also into rice farming ventures. Remedios is asking for a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and fuel for the boat. With this, her husband will be able to improve his catch thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, and fuel for the boat

loans.name: Baraka Group

texts.en:
Baraka is a group of 10 farmers in Bungoma South District represented by Emily. The group has 9 women and 1 man. Emily is on the right of the photo with her hand raised. Farming inputs will be delivered to her on credit consisting of the necessary materials to plant ½ an acre of maize, millet and sorghum. Emily is a new One Acre Fund farmer and is excited for the 2013 Long Rains season. She joined One Acre Fund in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer and get inputs delivered to her on time. 

Emily described her harvest last year as good, but hopes she can have an even better one as a One Acre Fund farmer. She hopes that her profits from the 2013 Long Rains season can be used to send her children to school and rent a farm to do more farming. Emily’s group members will each receive input loans of ½ acre during the 2013 Long Rains season. In total they will receive inputs for 5 acres of maize and sorghum.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Muyayi South A Group

texts.en:
Muyayi South A Group is located in Bungoma District. It is a group of 15 women and 6 men led by Geoffrey pictured on the right with his hand raised. He is receiving an input loan for ½ acre of maize, millet, and sorghum cultivation. The 2013 Long Rains season will be Geoffrey’s first season with One Acre Fund. He joined this year in order to gain access to hybrid seed and fertilizer, grow enough food for his family, and fight hunger in the commmunity.

Last year, Geoffrey harvested 8 bags of maize on 1 acre of land. He is excited to improve his harvest as a One Acre Fund farmer during the 2013 Long Rains season. He plans to use the money that he earns from his next harvest to send his children to school and invest in cows. For the 2013 Long Rains season, Geoffrey’s group members will take input loans of ½ acre each. In total, this group will receive input loans for use on 10.5 acres of land.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seed and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, millet, and sorghum.

loans.name: Rustamjon

texts.ru: Рустамчон мужчина в возрасте 38 лет, женат, имеет четверых детей.  Рустамчон всю свою жизнь занимается животноводством так как не имеет образования и в свое время не учился.   Жена домохозяйка,занимается воспитанием детей но в свободное время помогает мужу по откорму скота.  Они живут в горном районе и откорм скота является приемлемым и дает очень хороший доход. Так как это их единственный доход они стараются развивать этот бизнес.  Чтобы прокормить семью и улучшить жизнедеятельность, он планирует увеличить поголовье скота и на полученный кредит купить скот.  У него есть большая мечта, он хочет чтобы его дети учились в хороших учебных заведениях и поэтому стремится достичь своей цели.   Рустамчон очень рад,что существуют такие организации как Кива, что с помощью таких организаций люди которые нуждаются в финансовой поддержке могут осуществить свои планы. Рустамчон заранее благодарит организацию Кива.
texts.en: Rustamjon is 38 years old, married, and has 4 children. He has worked in animal husbandry all his life because he did not study in his younger years and does not have an education. His wife is a homemaker who raises the children, but in her free time, she helps her husband feed the cattle. They live in a mountainous region where raising cattle is a good way of making a living and brings in a nice income. As this is their only source of earnings, they are trying to develop their business. In order to feed his family and improve his livelihood, Rustamjon plans to increase his herd and will use this loan to purchase cattle. He has a big dream: he wants his children to study in good educational institutions, which is why he is striving to reach his goal. He is very happy that such organisations as Kiva exist, and that with their assistance, people who need financial support can realise their plans. Rustamjon thanks Kiva in advance.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Roditha

texts.en: Roditha is a 27 years old and married with 2 children. She lives in Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting rice for sale to earn a living. She's been with her business over 3 years and earns 4,000 PHP. She joined GDMPC in 2012. She requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Edwina

texts.en: Edwina is 29 years old and married with 2 children. She lives Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She owns and operates farmland, planting and harvesting corn for sale and earns 4,000 PHP as a living. She joined GDMPC in 2012. Edwina requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure

loans.name: Qurbonali

texts.ru: Курбонали житель города Дангара. Ему 49 лет. Он женат и отец четверых детей. Его старший сын уехал на заработки в заграницу, а второй сын служит в армии. У Курбонали среднее специальное образование. Он работал педагогом в средней школе в течение семи лет. С 2008 года он занимается животноводством. Он покупает крупно-рогатый скот, откармливает его, затем продает с наценкой. Курбонали берет кредит для закупа скота. За счет его прибыли он планирует расширить свою деятельность.
texts.en: Qurbonali lives in the town of Dangara. He is 49 years old, married, and has 4 children. His eldest son is a migrant worker in a foreign country, and his second oldest son is serving in the army. Qurbonali has a specialised secondary education. For 7 years, he worked as a teacher in a high school, and since 2008, he has been raising cattle. He buys cattle, fattens them, and then sells them for a profit. He is now seeking a loan to purchase cattle. He plans to use the income generated by this loan to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, de 48, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Gerardo su esposo. Ambos tienen 6 hijos a los que cuidan con mucho amor y cariño, en la casa que heredaron hace 10 años. 
Ella es una mujer muy ágil, sobre todo porque siempre, camina varios kilómetros para poder ordeñar sus vacas, quienes se encuentran en un establo a las afueras de su localidad. Todo el día ella se dedica sus cuidados, pues siempre le brindan un promedio de 10 litros de leche con lo que realiza, moldes de queso que la ayuda a conseguir ingreso económico diario. Además aprovecha ese tiempo para poder cuidar de sus sembríos de papa, maíz y demás hortalizas, las cuales cosecha con mucha satisfacción y las comercializa en el mismo lugar. “los mismo comerciantes llegan con sus camiones”, afirma. Se siente tranquila y tiene muchos planes de mejorar su calidad de vida, pues su esposo trabaja en una empresa de construcción de carreteras, donde está obteniendo buenos ingresos.
Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “La rosa de paltarumi” y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada.
Julia, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales y si el dinero le alcanza fertilizantes naturales para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Julia, age 48, is a hard-working woman.  She lives with her husband, Gerardo.  They have six children, whom they are raising with great love and affection in the house they inherited ten years ago.

She is a very agile woman.  This is mostly because she always walks several kilometers in order to be able to milk their cows.  The cows are in a stable on the outskirts of her area.  She spends her whole day taking care of them.  They always give her an average of ten liters of milk, which she uses to make cheese molds.  This helps her to get daily income.

She also takes advantage of this time to take care of her potato, corn, and vegetable crops.  She harvests them with great satisfaction, and she sells them in the same place.  “The same merchants come in their trucks,” she says.

She feels at peace, and she has a lot of plans to improve her quality of life.  Her husband works for a road construction company, and he gets good income.

She belongs to the La Rosa de Paltarumi communal bank, and this is her eighth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to be able to do her normal business activities because she has support from all of you.  She pledges to make all of her payments punctually.  She has always been a hard-working and honest person.

Julia will use the requested loan to buy balanced feed for her animals.  If there is enough money, she will buy natural fertilizers for her crops.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for her animals, and if there is enough money, she will buy natural fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Hasanboy

texts.ru:
Хасанбой с юности занимается откормом и разведением скота.   Он женат и имеет четверых детей.  Хасанбой занимается откормом скота у себя дома.  Недавно он женил своего сына, сыграли очень веселую свадьбу. Были очень крупные расходы,он продал два скота,чтобы провести свадьбу.  Теперь Хасанбой хочет построить дом для молодоженов так как всем вместе жить им очень тесно.  Откорм скота это их единственный доход  поэтому Хасанбой планирует развивать этот бизнес и на прибыль построить дом для сына.  
 На полученный кредит Хасанбой хочет купить скот и увеличить стадо. Таким образом он расширит свой бизнес и откормив до весны,продаст за хорошую прибыль.  Он заранее благодарит организацию Кива за финансовую поддержку и понимание.
texts.en: Hasanboy has been raising cattle since his youth. He is married and has 4 children. He raises cattle at home. Recently, he hosted a very jubilant wedding for his son. He incurred substantial expenses, and sold 2 cows to pay for the wedding. Now he wants to build a house for the newlyweds, as it is too crowded for the whole family to live together. Raising cattle is their only source of income, which is why Hasanboy plans to develop his business and use the profit to build a house for his son. He will use the loan to buy cattle to increase his herd, thereby expanding his business and enabling him to sell the fattened cattle in the spring for a good profit. He thanks Kiva in advance for the financial support and understanding.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 44 años es una madre responsable. Tiene 2 hijas, pero solo vive con Yanina, la última hija. Cuidó de sus hijas, sola, “fue difícil”, comenta pero con la ayuda de su familia pudo salir adelante. Su principal actividad económica es el bordado de fustanes Wanka, que son trajes típicos. Consiste en el bordado a hilo, los cuales vende a 200 nuevos soles, y a la semana realiza un promedio de 2 que comercializa en un mercado reconocido de la ciudad. Pero como buena mujer del campo, por temporadas siembra papa y olluco en sus propios terrenos agrícolas, cuenta que en cada cosecha comercializa sus alimentos en la feria de uno de los distritos de la ciudad, donde obtiene buenas ganancias, aprovecha esa oportunidad, para vender los animales que cría entre toros y cerdos. Ahora se encuentra tranquila y con la convicción de sacar profesional a su última hija. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “barrio oriental” y este es el crédito número 17 con MFP, por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, pues lleva muchos años de conocerlos.
María; invertirá el dinero en la compra de abono orgánico para su próxima siembra y si el dinero le alcanza comprará comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
María is 44 years old and is a responsible mother.  She has 2 daughters, but she only lives with Yanina, her oldest daughter.  She raised her daughters by herself.  "It was difficult," she says, but with the help of her family she was able to get by.  

Her main source of income is embroidering traditional "Wanka" underskirts.  She embroiders with thread and sells her products for 200 sols.  She makes an average of 2 products a week, which she sells in a well-known market in the city.  However, like every good country woman, she also sows potatoes and olluco (a native tuber) on her own farmland.  

She says that when she harvests her crops, she sells them in the market in one of the districts of the city, where she makes good profits.  She makes the most of this opportunity to sell the animals that she raises (bulls and pigs).  Currently, María is calm in the knowledge that she will help her youngest daughter become a professional.  

María is a member of "Barrio Oriental" (Eastern Neighborhood) communal bank and this is her 17th loan from MFP.  She is thankful for their support, which will allow her to achieve her goals.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  In addition, she enjoys being a part of their organization and has been involved with them for many years.

María will invest the money she has requested in buying organic fertilizer to use for the next harvest and also balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: buy organic fertilizer for her next harvest and (if sufficient funds remain) healthy feed for her animals

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia, de 49 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Moisés, su esposo desde hace 16 años. Ambos tienen 6 hijos de los cuales solo vive con 3 de ellos en su casa propia. 
Ella se siente dichosa de tener el apoyo de su esposo, quien le ayuda cada vez que pueda. Pues la actividad de ambos es la agricultura, mientras su esposo trabaja como peón, ella se dedica a l cuidado de sus 8 vacas y 3 toros de las cuales extrae la leche que producen para venderlos a los pobladores de su localidad. Su secreto es sembrar por ella misma alfalfa y de esa manera alimenta a su animales, pero siempre les ofrece comida balanceada y vitaminas para mantenerlos fuertes y que produzcan buena leche. Paralelo a este trabajo siembra maíz, papa; en terrenos alquilados, ya cuando es tiempo de la cosecha los comercializa a los compradores mayoristas que buscan el maíz que solo ella sabe producir. Quiere comprar sus propios terrenos y así depender de ella misma. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “barrio oriental” y este es el crédito número 18 con MFP, por tanto agradece su apoyo, con el cual logrará cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, pues lleva muchos años de conocerlos.
Antonia; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de abono orgánico para esparcir en sus cultivos y si el dinero le alcanza comprará también comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Antonia is 49 years old. She is a hardworking woman who lives with her husband of 16 years, Moisés. They have 6 children together, 3 of whom still live with them in their own home.

She feels blessed that her husband supports her and that he helps her whenever he is able. They both work in agriculture. While her husband works as a laborer, she cares for their 8 cows and 3 bulls. She also milks the cows and sells the milk to the residents of their village. In addition to the balanced feed and vitamins that she feeds her animals to keep them healthy and to aid in good milk production, she secretly plants alfalfa to feed them. She also plants corn and potatoes on land that she rents. When it is time to harvest her crops, she sells them to wholesale buyers who request her corn in particular. She wants to buy her own piece of land so she can be independent. She belongs to a supportive group called “Barrio Oriental” and this is their 18th loan with MFP. She is grateful for all the support she has received to help her reach her goals. She is committed to making her payments. She is also happy to be a part of this group and has known them for many years.

Antonia will use her loan to buy organic fertilizer to spread on her crops as well as balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: purchase organic fertilizer for her crops and balanced feed for her animals.

loans.name: Chona

texts.en:
Chona, a 40-year-old married mother of five, lives in Ozamis City, Misamis Occidental. She has been growing and harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living for five years, earning 3,000 PHP a month.

A member of GDMPC since 2010, Chona has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Sayora

texts.ru:
Сайёра  женщина в возрасте 35 лет. Замужем, имеет 3 детей.   Она вместе с мужем    более  12 лет занимаются  откормом скота.   В наличии имеет около 18 голов мелко рогатого скота.    Сайёра содержит скот у себя дома и она  очень хорошо разбирается в преимуществах своего дела, знает когда закупать и продавать скот. У нее также имеется дойная корова.    Каждый день  Сайера доит по 10 литров молока и  продаёт молоко соседям и знакомым.  Старший сын находится в Российской Федерации. Он зарабатывает там денежные средства и каждый месяц по возможности отправляет деньги родителям, а младшие дети   пока  учатся в школе.   
 Сайёра  на полученный кредит   хочет купить скот и увеличить свое стадо.   Заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Sayora is 35 years old, married, and has 3 children. She and her husband have been raising livestock for over 12 years. They now have 18 head of livestock which Sayora raises at home. She has a very good understanding of the nature of this business, and she knows when to buy and sell animals. She also has a dairy cow. Every day, she milks up to 10 litres of milk and sells it to her neighbours and acquaintances. Her eldest son is in the Russian Federation where he earns money, and he sends some cash to his parents every month whenever possible. Her younger children are still studying in school. Sayora plans to use this loan to increase her herd. She thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, de 23 años es una responsable madre soltera. Vive en compañía de su hijo Marck y su mamá felicita, en la casa donde nació. Desde niña le enseñaron a sembrar y dedicarse a la tierra, en terrenos que le fueron heredados por parte de su madre, siembra maíz, su principal y único cultivo, pues como ella dice, ahí obtiene mayores ganancias, ya que es el alimento que más se consume en la región y siempre mantiene el precio de venta en el mercado. Los meses donde obtiene más ganancias, es en setiembre y octubre, por ello se encuentra en planes de sembrar programando la cosecha para esos meses. De la misma manera cuenta con 2 toros, que le sirven para arar la tierra, para comenzar la siembra, “de esa manera no pago a otras personas por hacerlo”, comenta. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Sarita colonia” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, agradece la oportunidad que le brindan, ya que podrá mejorar su negocio. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, pues le gusta trabajar en su asociación, donde todos son personas responsables y solidarias.
Maribel, invertirá el dinero en la compra de semilla y abono orgánico para distribuir entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Maribel, age 23, is a responsible single mother.  She lives with her son, Marck, and her mother, Felicity.  She lives in the house where she was born. Ever since she was a girl, they taught her how to plant and work the land.  

She grows corn, her principle and only crop, on land inherited from her mother.  As she says, that way you get good income.  This is because it is the food that is consumed the most in the region, and it always maintains its price in the market.  She gets the most income in September and October.  Therefore, she is planning to plant and program the harvest for these months.

She also has two bulls that she uses to plow the land in order to start sowing.  “This way I do not pay other people to do it,” she says.

She belongs to the Sarita Colonia communal bank, and this is her third loan with MFP.  She is grateful for this opportunity because she will be able to improve her business.  She pledges to make her payments.  She likes working with her communal bank, where all of the people are responsible and supportive.

Maribel will use the loan to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
En la calidad ciudad de Chincha, caracterizada también por su alegría y su variada gastronomía, vive Mary una joven con un carisma contagiante y sobre todo con muchas ganas de salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades. Mary en sus pocos tiempos libres disfruta de escuchar música ya que actualmente estudia la carrera de contabilidad y para poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios trabaja en un supermercado de su ciudad, ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y acude a sus clases por las noches, a pesar de ser un poco cansado ella saca muchas fuerzas para seguir adelante ya que para ella el ser una profesional es su mayor objetivo y sobre todo porque quiere darle a sus padres la alegría de verla convertida en una profesional.

Mary está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales de estudio como libros, separatas, entre otros; de esta manera podrá tener los materiales necesarios para estudiar y poder luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y tener un buen empleo”.
texts.en:
In the warm city of Chincha, also characterized by its happiness and its varied cuisine, lives Mary, a young girl with infectious charisma, and above all, a great desire to get ahead in spite of adversities.  

In her little free time, Mary enjoys listening to music, since she is currently studying accounting.  In order to cover her educational expenses, she works in a supermarket in her city.  She works around 8 hours a day and attends her classes at night.  Even though it's a bit tiring, she puts forth great effort in order to get ahead.  For her, becoming a professional is her most important goal and above all, she wants to give her parents the joy of seeing her become a professional.

Mary is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because, thanks to their support, she will be able to buy study materials such as books and supplements, among other things.  In this way, she will be able to have the materials she needs to study and to be able to fight to realize her greatest dream:  "To finish her degree and to get a good job."

loans.use: to buy books, materials and supplements, among other things.

loans.name: Luz

texts.en:
Luz is 48 years old, married, with four children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

She owns and operates farmland, planting, harvesting, and selling bananas to earn a living. She's been with her business over five years and earns PHP 2,000 each month. Luz joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) in 2010. 

Luz requested a loan PHP 6,000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In the future, she wants to improve her living situation.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise.

loans.name: Zioymidin

texts.ru: Зиёмидин, мужчина в возрасте 46 лет, проживает в сельской местности. Женат и имеет троих детей. Зиёмидин работает в колхозе , бригадиром. На протяжении 10 лет он занимается выращиванием пшеницы. По мимо пшеницы у него 5 Га земли с абрикосовым садом. Зиёмидин единственный кормилец в семье, супруга его нигде не работает, так как не имеет высшего образования. В свободное время от домашних дел  она помогает супругу по выращиванию пшеницы.  Зиёмидин, берет кредит для закупки минерального удобрения. Он благодарен ООО МДО Арванд за своевременную поддержку в тяжелую минуту.
texts.en:
Zioymidin is a 46-year-old man living in a rural area. He is married and has three children. Zioymidin works on the collective farm as a foreman. For ten years, he has been involved in the cultivation of wheat. Aside of the wheat, he has five hectares of land with an apricot orchard. 

Zioymidin is the only breadwinner for the family, and his wife is not working and does not have a higher education. In her spare time from household chores, she helps her husband to grow wheat. 

Zioymidin is taking a loan to but mineral fertilizer. He is thankful to Arvand MDO Ltd. for the timely support in a difficult moment.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 57 years old, widowed, with three children. She lives in Clarin, Misamis Occidental. 

Flora owns and operates a business selling seafood products, including fish and shrimp, in the local community. She's been engaged with her business for over 18 years and she earns PHP 7,000 per month. She joined Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDPMC) in 2009. 

Flora requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional fish and shrimp products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish and shrimp products to sell.

loans.name: Alfredo Adalberto

texts.es: Alfredo Adalberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la  compra y venta de repuestos para bicicleta, llantas, cadenas, frenos, entre otros  se ha hecho de mucha experiencia lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, ya tiene mucha clientela y las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente; Alfredo es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y todo un soñador, todos los días lucha por cumplir cada una de sus metas,  esta totalmente comprometido con su sueño y no descansara hasta tener éxito, necesita de materiales para el negocio es por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar llantas, frenos, cadenas, asientos, etc. Alfredo Adalberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe en que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alfredo Adalberto lives with his life partner and their children in his own home.  He has a business buying and selling spare parts for bicycles, including: tires, chains, brakes, and other parts.  He has a lot of experience in this line of work, and so he is able to obtain good earnings.  He already has a lot of customers, and they prefer his business because all of his products are good quality and affordable, and he offers unparalleled service that is always to his customers' liking.  Alfredo is an enterprising man who is devoted to his work.  He is also a dreamer, who strives each day to accomplish every one of his goals.  He is committed to accomplishing his dream, and will not rest until he achieves success.  

Alfredo needs some supplies for his business, so for this reason he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  He will use the funds to buy tires, brakes, chains, seats, etc.  Alfredo Adalberto has good credit references and is very responsible.  He is certain that he will be able to pay off the debt, and he also has faith that he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bicycle tires, brakes, chains and seats

loans.name: Liparit

texts.ru:
Липариту 60 лет. Он женат и живет вместе с сыном, невесткой и внуками. Жена Липарита находится за границей на командировке. 
Липарит более 20 лет  как занимается ремонтом электродвигателей. У него множество клиентов - не только физические лица а также юридические лица предпочитают обратится за ремонтом электродвигателей к Липариту . У Липарита тяжелая но прибыльная работа, которая позволяет ему достойно содержать семью. 
Содержать ин большую семью Липариту помогает сын который работает рабочим  в Медно-молибденовом комбинате Капана . 
На этот месяц у Липарита множество заказов и ему нужен кредит на сумму 700.000 Армянских драм,  для покупки электропроводов разного сечения. Кредит  поможет липариту во время выполнить все заказы ,что обеспечат ему хорошую прибыль .
texts.en:
Liparit is 60 years old. He is married and lives together with his son, daughter-in-law and grandchildren. Liparit's wife is aboard on a business assignment. 

For more than 20 years, Liparit has been repairing electrical motors. He has many customers -- not only individuals but also business entities prefer to seek Liparit to complete motor repairs. For Liparit, it is challenging but lucrative work that allows him to provide adequate support for his family. 
 
To support their large family, Liparit is helped by his son who is a worker in the Kapan copper-molybdenum factory. 

This month Liparit has many orders and he needed a loan of 700,000 Armenian dram (AMD) to purchase electrical cables of different cross-sections. The loan will help Liparit to fulfill all the orders, which will provide him a good profit.

loans.use: to purchase electrical cables of different cross-sections

loans.name: Tulkinjon

texts.ru:
Тулкинчон пришел в МДО «Арванд» чтобы получить кредит для увеличения поголовья скота. В данное время у него всего лишь три голов скота так как в прошлом году он построил дом и ему пришлось продать несколько голов скота,чтобы купить строительные материалы. Сейчас у него есть денежные средства но не достаточно чтобы купить скот. Тулкинчон планирует продолжать развивать свой бизнес и хочет увеличить поголовье скота.
 На полученный кредит Тулкинчон хочет скот и поэтому обратился в Арванд, он надеется что ему помогут и поддержат Финансово. Заранее благодарит.
texts.en:
Tulkinjon joined MDO Arvand in order to get a loan to increase his count of livestock. At this time, he has only three head of cattle since last year he built a home and had to sell a few head of cattle to buy building materials. Now, he has money but not enough to buy cattle. Tulkinjon plans to continue to grow his business and wants to increase the number of livestock. 

With the loan, Tulkinjon wants cattle and therefore appealed to Arvand. He hopes that they will help him and provide financial support.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Abdurahmon

texts.ru: Абдурахмон , родился и проживает в сельской местности ,  он 1949 года рождения. Женат и имеет 3 детей. Абдурахмон, с юности занимается выращиванием абрикосового сада, а также работает в колхозе- бригадиром. В летний время года Абдурахмон собирает урожай, затем этот урожай сушит и продает на местном рынке. Это его основной семейный доход. Супруга его нигде не работает, она помогает ему в сборе, сушки и продаже урожая. Абдурахмон берет кредит для покупки минеральных удобрений.Он выражает свою благодарность ООО МДО Арванд за финансовую поддержку , так как наша поддержка- ваш успех!
texts.en:
Abdurahmon was born and lives in a rural area. He was born in 1949. He is married and has three children. 

Abdurahmon since his youth has been involved in tending apricot orchards, and works as a foreman at a collective farm. In the summer season, Abdurahmon harvests the fruit, then dries it and sells at the local market. This is the main source of income for his family. His wife does not work anywhere, but she helps him in collecting, drying and selling the crop. 

Abdurahmon is taking a loan to buy mineral fertilizers. He expresses his gratitude to MDO Arvand for financial support.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Martha Karla

texts.es:
La señora Martha Karla esta soltera, tiene 20 años de edad, cursó los grado de educación diversificada, se dedica al bordado de blusas, inicio este negocio con poco capital e insumos, hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que será utilizado, para la compra de telas y conos para mejorar su producción de blusas, espera seguir trabajando fuerte y tener un negocio con mucha demanda y poder vender su producción en otras regiones.
texts.en:
Martha Karla is single and 20 years old. She has completed her diploma in diversified education. Martha Karla embroiders blouses. She began this business with little capital and materials. Presently, she has 3 years experience.

Martha Karla is requesting a loan that will be utilized to buy cloth and cones of thread in order to improve her production of blouses. She hopes to continue working hard so that she can have a business with strong demand, and be able to sell her production in other regions.

loans.use: buy necessary materials for embroidering blouses.

loans.name: Francisco Jose

texts.es:
